Él espera que todo su proceso del cultivo sea correcto, tener una producción abundante que le permita comercializar una parte y también su familia se alimente de este trabajo.
texts.en:
José is a farmer.  He grows corn and beans and also raises livestock.  He lives in the company of his wife and two-year-old son.  José has worked with livestock and in farming for ten years having learned from his father; to date he’s happy with his occupation.

He is currently asking for a loan to buy farming supplies because he’s planting corn and beans and needs manure and fertilizer to strengthen his plants in order to insure the growth of the corn and the bean plants although his crop yields depend for the most part on the weather conditions.

He hopes that the entire growing process will be correct and to have an abundant harvest that will allow him both to sell part of it and also that his family can feed itself thanks to this work.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertillzer for his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Ascension

texts.es:
Ascensión, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 15, 14 y 13 años de edad, él es agricultor y albañil, tiene 30 años de estar sembrando maíz  y frijol, además trabaja la albañilería, aprendió por su padre y trabaja todos los días o dependiendo de la necesidad de trabajo.
Por el momento Ascensión necesita un préstamo para invertirlo en abono, insecticidas y fertilizantes, todos estos materiales para aplicarlos a la siembra, pues ayudan a crecer la plantación de maíz y frijol.
Él espera tener una cosecha abundante, generar ingresos para la familia y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Ascensión lives with his wife and three children who are 15, 14 and 13 years of age.  He’s both a farmer and a bricklayer.  He’s been farming corn and beans for 30 years.  He learned from his father and works every day or according to the work needed.

At present, Ascensión needs a loan to buy manure, insecticide and fertilizer.  He will apply all these materials to his crops because they help the corn and beans to grow.  He hopes to have an abundant harvest to generate income for the family and continue supporting his children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticide and fertilizer for his corn crops.

loans.name: Norma Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Norma es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 53 años quien inicio hace 15 años con unos ahorros que a realizar  tortillas y luego con las ganancias invirtió en comida. Con este negocio logro sacar adelante a sus cuatro hijos los cuales son mayores.
Ella con el crédito comprara maíz, arroz, carne, frijoles…etc. y sueño es tener un restaurante con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Norma is a hard-working and enterprising woman of 53 years. She began some 15 years ago, investing her savings to make tortillas and, later, with her earnings, she invested in preparing meals to sell. With this business, she has helped her 4 children forge ahead.  They are all adults now.

With the present loan, Norma will purchase corn, rice, meat, beans, etc., to sell. Her dream is to have a restaurant with all the necessary things.

loans.use: buy corn, rice, meat, beans, etc., to prepare meals to sell.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana mujer emprendedora, trabajadora, honesta, madre soltera uno de sus hijos le ayudan económicamente, los otros están estudiando. Desde hace tiempo trabaja como conserje, tiene su proyecto de mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda poco a poco ir cambiando la madera por paredes de concreto,  con este préstamo seguirá realizándole cambio a la casa comprando materiales como: láminas, de zinc, golosa, perlines, bloques, cemento,. Para entechar la casa obteniendo seguridad, protección y comodidad.
texts.en: Ana is an enterprising, hard working, honest single mother.  One of her children helps her out economically; the others are still in school.  For some time now she’s been employed as a caretaker.  She has a home improvement project: to gradually replace the wood with concrete walls.  With this loan she will continue doing these changes to the house buying materials like: zinc metal sheets, screws, purlines, concrete blocks and cement to roof the house obtaining security, protection and comfort.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica tiene 30 años, es una mujer carismática y laboriosa, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Edwin de 28 años y su primogénita Ariana de 02 años de edad, a quien desea brindarle toda su atención y velar por su salud. Desde muy joven a Jessica le nació el gusto por las prendas de vestir, es por ello, que con el tiempo decidió dedicarse a la venta de ropas, actualmente realizando una ardua labor semanal ofreciendo ropa a domicilio, ya que según manifiesta que así obtiene un poco más de ganancia por sus prendas, las cuales ella misma se encarga de comprar y trasladar desde la ciudad de Lima. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es dialogar con sus clientes sobre las prendas que están de moda en las mejores ciudades, ella menciona que al hacer eso se esta apoderando de la confianza de sus compradores. Lleva 04 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que transportar los pesados fardos de ropa a distintos caseríos, pero aún así no se da por vencida, ya que sabe que de esta actividad depende el bienestar de su familia. Con el  apoyo de ustedes podrá viajar a la ciudad de lima para poder comprar cantidad y variedad de prendas de vestir. Para el bien de su estabilidad económica espera situar posteriormente su negocio en las galerías de la ciudad de San Francisco, en la cual pueda brindar un mejor servicio. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de ustedes para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy jovial y pone la chispa para salir del aburrimiento. Los 3,000 nuevos soles le serán de gran utilidad, ya que desea comprar prendas de vestir para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jessica, 30 years old, is a charismatic and hard-working woman, who lives in her own house alongside her husband Edwin, who is 28 years old, and her first-born, Ariana, who is 2 years old. Jessica would like to offer Ariana her total attention and to guard her health.

From an early age, Jessica developed an interest in articles of women's clothing.  That's why, over time, she decided to dedicate herself to selling clothes. At present, Jessica works hard every week, offering clothing in homes, since in this manner, she earns a little extra from her items of clothing. She buys and transports inventory from far-away Lima.

What she likes best about her work is conversing with her customers about what is in style in the larger cities. She mentioned that in this way she is enhancing her buyer's confidence. Jessica has been doing this for 4 years. The most difficult part, she says, is transporting the heavy boxes of clothing to distinct residential areas. But she doesn't give up, knowing that the well-being of her family depends on her doing this.

With your help, she will be able to travel to the city of Lima to buy a quantity and variety of clothing items.  To enhance her economic stability, she hopes in the future to establish her business in the galleries of the city of San Francisco, where she could offer better service.

This is Jessica's 4th loan through MFP.  She is very content knowing that she can count on your help to continue growing. In her communal bank Jessica is a very jovial member who lights a spark that overcomes boredom.

The 3,000 new sols will be of great utility, since she wants to buy clothing items to meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: to buy more items of clothing to sell door-to-door.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado Mujeres en Acción es D. la ciudad D. Asunción. Actualmente esta formado por 22 integrantes y se encuentran en el sexto ciclo. Todas las miembros se unieron para poder generar más ingresos y así poder paliar los gastos del día a día.
La Señora Carolina tiene 28 años D. edad, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la venta D. carbón desD. hace ya vaR. años, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien definida. Sus hijos la ayudan a fraccionar el carbón y lo distribuye en los almacenes del del barrio D. la ciudad en un carrito, todo esto lo realiza en horas D. la tarD.  y regresa a su casa ya cuando oscurece. Es una señora muy luchadora y valiente porque lucha día a día para poder salir adelante y así ayudar en los gastos a su marido.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. carbón, ya que sabe que teniendo más reserva del producto no la tomarán D. sorpresa los pedidos D. los clientes.
texts.en:
This committee is in its sixth loan cycle.  It is located in the city of Asunción.  The group currently has 22 members who all came together so that they could make more income and thereby ease their daily expenses.

Carolina is 28 years old and has two children.  She sells charcoal.  Her children help her to diviD. up the charcoal and deliver it to the local neighborhood stores in the city on a cart.  Carolina does all her work in the afternoon and returns home when it gets dark.  She is a very beautiful lady who is brave because she works hard every day in order to get ahead in life and help her husband with their expenses.  She is requesting this loan to buy charcoal as she knows that by having more in stock, she will not be taken by surprise by her customers' orders.

loans.use: Compra de carbón para la posterior venta

loans.name: Ismael Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ismael lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Karen Jahoska de 23 años quien vende prendas desde hace 2 años  la cual inicio sacando mercadería al crédito y poco apoco fue creciendo su negocio. Ella con el crédito comprara la mercadería al contado lo cual le proporcionara mayor cantidad de ganancias.
Su meta es poder realizar sus estudios superiores ya que quiere ser Farmacéutica.
La otras integrantes son Elena de 29 años quien vende productos Avon y Rosa María de 25 años quien tiene una tienda de auto partes en el mercado oriental, vende prendas, ropa y carnicería.
texts.en:
The “Ismael” group is composed of three hard working, enterprising women. One of them is Karen Jahoska, 23, who has sold items for two years.  She started out taking out merchandise on credit and gradually created her business.  She will use the loan to pay cash for merchandise which will mean higher profits for her.  Her goal is to be able to go to college; she wants to be a Pharmacist.

The other members are Elena, 29, who sells Avon products and Rosa María, 25, who has an auto spare parts store in the Oriente Market and sells items, clothes and meats.

loans.use: to buy gold and silver merchandise.

loans.name: Resplandecer Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “RESPLANDECER” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Collpani, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Irene. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comercio de chalinas, producción, iniciación de negocio y servicio.
 
La señora Irene,  indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer  y que ingreso por invitación de una promotora que visito su casa. En la actualidad ella pretende hincar un negocio de costura de ropa, ya que aprendió corte y confección hace una año atrás. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra de una máquina de coser que adquirirá de la Ceja (lugar comercial de la ciudad de El Alto)  y posteriormente elaborado los productos los venderá a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permitirá generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en crédito y el cuidado de nuestra salud.

En la fotografia las acompañan las dos hijas de la Señora Justa, ellas son las dos muchachas que se encuentra adelante
texts.en:
The “Resplandecer” (To Outshine) communal bank will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Center.  It has six members and is led by a governing board headed by Irene.  The members of this communal bank carry out a variety of businesses, among which are: sweater sales, production, starting a business and service.

Irene tells us that this is the first time she’s joined Pro Mujer and that she did so thanks to an invitation from a promoter that visited her at home.  Currently, she intends to start a dressmaking business since she learned sewing and dressmaking a year ago.

The loan she’ll take out is to buy a sewing machine that she’ll get in La Ceja (commercial place in the city of El Alto) and once she starts making items she will sell them based on orders.  This way of working will allow her to generate resources to support her future family since she’s currently single.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the credit training and the health services.

In the photograph two of Justa’s daughters appear; they are the two young girls in front.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana de 26 años, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, vive en su propia casa al lado de su esposo Amancio 28 años y sus 02 queridos hijos a quienes desea brindarles una buena educación para que en un futuro próximo sean hombres de gran provecho. Juana es una mujer de ardua labor, se esmera a diario por entregar lo mejor a su familia. Ella se dedica al trabajo del agro donde siembra cacao y café; viene realizando esta actividad desde hace 07 años. Y gracias a los frutos que le brinda sus plantas, ella compró variedad de muebles para su hogar y a la vez compró su propia maquina fumigadora para el control de la plaga de insectos. En tiempo de cosecha y deshierbo de maleza, obligadamente contrata jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Ella cuenta con espacios de tierra sin cultivar, lo cual inevitablemente necesita el apoyo de todos ustedes para llevar consigo su propósito, tiene proyectado sembrar sus fincas con más plantas de café. Para el bien de su trabajo, espera contar con la misma fuerza e ímpetu que la caracteriza para sacar adelante  sus sembríos y a sus adorados hijos. Este será su segundo crédito, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar sus planes y por ende comprometerse a devolver  puntualmente los pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más semillas de café para que pueda aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Juana is 26 years old, a native of Quimbiri city, and lives in her own house alongside her husband Amancio, who is 26, and 2 dear sons, for whom she wishes to provide a good education that will benefit them in the future.

Juana is a hard-working woman, who strives every day to provide the best for her family. She works in agriculture, sowing chocolate and coffee. She has been doing this for the last 7 years. And thanks to the fruits offered by her plants, she has bought a variety of furniture for her home and, at the same time, purchased her own fumigating machine to control plagues of insects.

At harvest time, and during weeding, she hires day laborers to advance more rapidly in her crop routine. She has land that is not as yet cultivated, and this requires the help of all of you to carry out her proposal, to sow more coffee plants on the vacant land.

For the good of the project, Juana hopes she can count on that same force and impetus which has characterized her past efforts to forge ahead with both her plantings and her adored children's welfare.

This will be her 2nd loan, and she hopes for the help of each of you to realize her plans, promising to make her payments punctually. With this loan, Juana will buy more coffee seeds so that she can increase production.

loans.use: buy coffee seeds to plant on her available land.

loans.name: Edilson Vladimir

texts.es:
Edilson, vive con su familia, su esposa y un hijo, solamente este hijo depende de él, su oficio es la ganadería, inicio con ayuda de su padre, no tiene un horario fijo establecido.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado de repasto, esta compra le permitirá crecer y ampliar el número de ganado.
Su aspiración es ser un ganadero en grande, que produzca lácteos, y proveer para su familia el sustento necesario.
texts.en: Edilson lives with his family, his wife and son; this son is his only dependent.  He raises cattle.  He started out with help from his father.  He does not have a fixed work schedule.  He is currently asking for the loan to buy more meat producing cattle.  This purchase will help him grow and expand his herd size.  His goal is to be a large scale cattleman, to produce dairy products and to provide his family with the necessary nourishment.

loans.use: to buy meat producing cattle.

loans.name: Nuha

texts.en:
Nuha, from Madaba Jordan, is a 48-year-old married mother of four children. Nuha started her enterprise years ago from her home, selling a limited range of products from a small table; she later dedicated a corner in her home for the business and added shelves to hold more products. Now requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more products for her store, Nuha aspires to license it and move it from her home.

Note: the man in the photo is her husbened and sue to culturA. issues she refused to add her picture.

loans.use: to purchase products for her store.

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера – женщина, живущая в небольшом городе - Павлограде. Она начала свой собственный  бизнес совсем недавно. Вера торгует детской одеждой  на рынке родного города. Она выбрала именно это направление, так как детская одежда пользуется большим спросом. 

Вера хочет развивать свой бизнес. Она трудолюбива и старательна.  Вера содержит семью своей работой. Вера надеется, что кредит в сумме 10,000 гривен поможет  развитию ее бизнеса. Она закупит школьную форму к новому учебному году и сможет получить дополнительную прибыль.
texts.en:
Vera is a woman living in Pavlograd, a small town. She launched her own business just recently. Vera sells children’s clothing at the marketplace of her home town. She has selected this line of business because there is a lot of demand for children’s clothing.

Vera would like to grow her business further. She is hard-working and thorough. She supports her family thanks to this work. Vera hopes that her loan of 10,000 UAH will help her develop her business. She will stock up on school uniforms for the new school year and   be able to increase her revenues.

loans.use: to buy school uniform before the new school year (for resale)

loans.name: Yaneth De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
La señora Yaneth de los Ángeles de 32 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora madre de cinco niños de 15 años, 13 años, 10 años, 4 años y 6 meses de edad. Ella tiene una pulpería la cual inicio hace 15 años con la ayuda de su suegra y luego fue desarrollándolo hasta tener una venta surtida con los productos necesarios.
Ella invertirá el crédito en azúcar, arroz, frijoles, coca cola, pan, queso, aceite…etc. para seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Yaneth de los Ángeles, 32, is a hard working, enterprising mother of five children whose ages are 15, 13, 10, and 4 years and a 6-month-old.  She has a grocery store that she started fifteen years ago with help from her mother-in-law and then continued developing it until having a well stocked store with all the necessary products.  She will use the loan to buy sugar, rice, beans, Coca-Cola, bread, cheese, oil, etc. to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mujeres En Progreso Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la Ciudad de Caacupé. Actualmente esta integrado por 11 miembros.Se encuentran en el primer ciclo. Todas ellas trabajan en forma responsable y solidaria. Todas ellas se unen para que juntas puedan luchar contra las necesidades.
La presidenta del comité es la señora Lourdes, ella vive con su marido e hijos, trabaja en la cría y venta de pollos. Ella hace un tiempo que se dedica a esto, por lo que los vecinos del barrio la conocen por la calidad de sus animales. Ella por medio de este trabajo ha aumentando sus ingresos y así va logrando gradualmente una mejor calidad de vida.
La Sra. solicita el credito para la compra de mas animales con lo cual podrá aumentar aumentar el tamaño de su pequeña granja.
texts.en:
The women who belong to this committee are from the city of Caacupé.  The group currently has 11 members who are in their first loan cycle.  They all work responsibly and in a supportive manner.  They came together so that they could work hard in order to meet their needs.

The committee's president is Lourdes who lives with her husband and children.  She raises and sells chickens.  She has been in this business for some time and so her neighbors know her for the quality of her animals.  Through this work, she has increased her income and is thereby gradually enjoying a better quality of life.

Lourdes is requesting this loan to buy more animals so that she can increase the size of her small farm.

loans.use: to buy animals (chickens)

loans.name: Leonora

texts.es: Leonora tiene 27 años, es una joven sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia situado en la ciudad de Quimbiri junto a su pareja Leonardo de 29 años y sus 02 queridos por quienes vela por su salud y educación. Leonora, es una mujer de ardua labor con ganas de sobre salir y triunfar en la vida, su actividad  rutinaria es despertarse muy temprano para realizar el desayuno para los miembros de su familia  para luego dirigirse a abrir las puertas de su puesto de ventas, donde ofrece variedad de calzados al gusto del cliente. Ella es una vendedora muy hábil, sabe como convencer al cliente para que puedan comprarle un par de calzados. Menciona asimismo  que al principio le fue difícil ganarse la confianza de sus concurrentes, pero al ver la calidad y los precios módicos que ella las ofrecía, sus productos se fueron vendiendo de manera vertiginosa, recalca que todo esto se debe a ustedes, quienes depositaron su confianza en ella y gracias a ello adquirió un pequeño capital financiero y de ese modo fue progresando. Es así que una vez  más solicita el crédito para seguir progresando y poder comprar con el  dinero variedad de calzados. Su plan a futuro es seguir trabajando con el mismo ímpetu que la caracteriza para así sobresalir de la pobreza que aqueja su hogar. Este es será su segundo crédito y esta muy contenta de saber que una vez mas contará con el apoyo financiero y esta dispuesta a cumplir puntualmente con el rol de sus cronogramas de pago. Con el monto solicitado podrá adquirir zapatos y zapatillas en todas las tallas.
texts.en:
Leonora, 27, is an unassuming, hard working young woman.  She lives in her own house located in the city of Quimbiri with her spouse, Leonardo, 29, and their two beloved children whose health and education she sees to.  Leonora is a very hard working woman who very much wants to stand out and succeed in life.  

Her routine consists in rising very early to prepare breakfast for her family and then open up her sales stand where she offers a variety of footwear for her customers.  She is a very skilled seller; she knows how to convince the customer to buy a pair of shoes.  She also mentions that at the beginning it was difficult to win over their trust but upon seeing the quality and modest prices she offered, her products flew off the shelves.  She stresses that all this is thanks to you who have placed your trust in her because thanks to it she was able to get a little bit of financing and that’s how she started to make progress.

So, this is how she once again is asking for a loan to continue making progress and to be able to use the money to buy assorted footwear.  Her future plan is to continue working with the same impetus that characterizes her to overcome the poverty that afflicts her home.

This will be her second loan and she’s very happy to know that once again she’ll be able to count on financial support and she is willing to punctually follow the payment schedule.  She will use the requested amount to buy shoes and slippers in all sizes.

loans.use: to buy more footwear.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled, from Madaba, Jordan, is a 30 year-old married man and a father of two children.  Khaled is a carpenter. and is requesting a loan of 400 JD to expand his business.  He also wants to benefit from the nonfinanciA. services provided by Tamweelcom, especially the marketing channel that is circulated through its bazaars and permanent showrooms.

An aspiration of Khaled is to open his own showroom for his products.

loans.use: with project expansion

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La señorita Andrea tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres.
Ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de prendas de vestir y lencerías. Empezó el negoció hace 2 años con un pequeño capital que le han aportado sus padres y así obtuvo sus ingresos en forma independiente ya que ella siempre fue muy emprendedora por lo que logró que fuera un éxito su propósito.
Andrea cubre sus gastos de estudios y personales con dicha actividad como también aporta a la canasta familiar, por lo que sus padres son orgullosos de ella y sostienen que vale la pena apoyarla en sus emprendimientos.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de prendas de invierno en general debido a que es la temporada y ya tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
Miss Andrea is 20, single, and lives with her parents.
She sells clothing and lingerie as a street vendor. She started two years ago with a small amount of capital that her parents gave her, and then she made an income independently as she has always been very enterprising. Her project has been a success. 
Andrea covers the costs of her studies as well as her personal costs through this business, and she also contributes to the household funds. Her parents are proud of her for this, and see that it pays to support her in her enterprises.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of articles of winter clothing, since it is that season and she already has many orders.

loans.use: to purchase articles of winter clothing.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba sells maize in both small and large quantities at Elmina. She is single and has 2 children. She wants to expand the business by adding the loan to her capital. It would be used to buy 5 bags of maize to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to reinvest back into the business and to further her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of maize to sell.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander sells various home products at the central market in Melitopol city. He has been in business for 12 years. His income is about 5,000 Grivnas a month.  He enjoys selling small things that help make home chores easier.  Alexander is a very happy and enthusiastic person. With his income, he helps his sisters and their parents with whom he lives in one big house. He is not married.

Alexander would like to get a loan of 12,000 Grivnas to increase the assortment of his inventory. He always tries to have a large assortment of small home products to offer something to each client who comes his way.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of his inventory

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is showing some maize she uses to cook banku for sale.  She is married to a farmer and they live with their 5 children.  She cooks banku and serves it with fried fish and hot pepper sauce. This business has been in existence for six years. Her loan will be used to buy maize for banku and fish for cooking. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards building a house. At the time of the visit, she had not cooked for the day; and so is showing the maize she uses for the banku.

loans.use: to buy maize for banku, and fish for cooking.

loans.name: Ekua Grace

texts.en: Ekua sells jewelry by moving from one area to another at Kokoado near Elmina. She is a single parent taking care of one child. She has been in this business for 8 years. She sees to the upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy more jewelry to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards the child's education.

loans.use: to buy more jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Arabela Group

texts.es:
El grupo Arabela lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Auxiliadora del Socorro de 42 años se dedica al comercio de nacatamales y chiverías desde hace 5 años. Este negocio lo inicio con la venta de chocobanos, helados…etc. con las ganancias empezó a realizar pequeñas cantidades de nacatamales.
Ella tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales su hija menor  de 16 años le ayuda en el negocio. La meta de Auxiliadora es invertir en otro negocio como la venta de ropa y calzado.
Las otras integrantes son Mayda de 30 años quien tiene una tortillería y vende chiverías y Jenny de los Ángeles de 24 años comercializa desde hace 5 años cosméticos, ropa y perfumes.
texts.en:
The Arabela group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising women. The group coordinator is Mrs. Auxiliadora del Socorro, age 42. She has sold nactamales [a traditional dish-dough, filled with meat and vegetables and wrapped in plantain leaves] and dairy products for five years. She started this business selling chocolate bananas, ice creams...etc. With her earnings, she started making small amounts of nactamales.
She has four children, and her oldest daughter (age 16) helps her with the business. Auxiliadora's goal is to invest in another business, such as clothing and shoe sales.
The other members are Mayda, age 30, who sells tortillas and dairy products, and Jenny de los Angeles, age 24, who has sold cosmetics, clothing and perfumes for five years.

loans.use: to purchase corn, hogs, firewood...etc.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa sells shea butter, steel wool and soaps at Elmina. She is single and has 5 children. She has been selling shea butter for 6 years. She sees to the well-being of the home. Her loan will be used to buy more shea butter and soaps. She hopes to reinvest the new profits back into her business.

loans.use: to buy more shea butter and soaps.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz tiene 24 años, es una mujer  trabajadora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su pareja Rubén de 31 años y sus 02 queridos hijos, Yosu de 05 y Ruana de 01año, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Luz es una madre joven, quien lucha ante las dificultades que aqueja su hogar, pero ante ello no se amilana al contrario es una mujer hábil y trabaja para sacar adelante a sus queridos hijos. Nos comenta, que se esfuerza por llevar algo que comer para sus hijos. Pues su trabajo consiste en vender ropa, ofreciéndolo en la calle, lleva  02 años en este negocio y lo poco que gana  lo alcanza para alimentar y educar a sus queridos hijos. El crédito le servirá como capital financiero para poder comprar variedad de prendas de vestir. Luz, piensa en grande y esta segura que mas adelante alquilará un puesto en los centros comerciales donde pueda exhibir con mayor tranquilidad su mercadería por lo cual se esmera a diario por ahorrar lo poco de sus ganancias. Este será su segundo crédito y esta muy contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo de los financistas para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal, trabaja conjuntamente con el resto de las socias. Con el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Luz is 24. She is a hard-working woman who lives in a rented home with her partner, Ruben, age 31, and their two beloved children: Yosu, age 5, and Ruana, age 1. Her children are the motivation for all of her hard work. Luz is a young mother who works hard in the face of the difficulties that afflict her home, and does not shrink back in spite of them. She is a competent women who works to get her children ahead. She tells us that she works hard to provide her children with food to eat. She sells clothing in the streets and has been doing this for two years. Bit by bit she saves up her earnings to feed and educate her beloved children. She will use this loan as capital to purchase a variety of clothing articles. Luz thinks big and is certain that in the future she will have a spot in the shopping centers to display her merchandise with greater ease. Thus, she goes to great pains every day to save even a little of her earnings. This will be her second loan and she is very happy to know that she will have the support of lenders to continue growing. In her communal bank, she works together with the rest of the members. With the requested loan, she will invest in a variety of clothing articles.

loans.use: to purchase more articles of clothing.

loans.name: Mallku Irpiri Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MALLKU IRPIRI” iniciará el ciclo número seis en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Germán Busch.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes, la asociación comunal está dirigida por una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la señora  Noelia.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: fabrica de encuadernación, plomería, chofer, chaperia, comedera, costura de chamarras y mochilas y venta de calzados.
 
La señora Noelia indica que hace seis años que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de fabricación de encuadernados.

El crédito que sacará ahora es para el aumento de capital (compra de carton, cuero, etc.) los que compra de la distribuidora y lo venderá en su empleada. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene un hijo.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro del préstamo y la capacitación.
texts.en:
The "Mallku Irpiri" communal bank is starting its sixth cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the German Busch Central Office. It has eight members and is governed by a board of directors, headed by Mrs. Noelia. The members' businesses are varied and include: bookbinding, plumbing, driving, vehicle repair, a canteen, sewing jackets and backpacks, and shoe sales.

Noelia says that she has belonged to a Pro Mujer communal bank for six years, after receiving an invitation from a friend. She currently has a bookbinding business.

The loan that she is now taking out is for increasing her capital (purchasing carton, leather, etc), buying from a distributor and selling once it is all together. This work allows her to generate an income to support her family where possible. She lives with her partner and has one child.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the loan savings and the training.

loans.use: to purchase carton and leather

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a widow selling clothes and underwear at Kokoado, a village near Elmina in Cape Coat. She has 7 dependents. The income she makes from her sales is used to take care of her home. The loan will serve to buy more clothing and underwear. Mary plans to save towards acquiring a shop.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and underwear to sell.

loans.name: Basma

texts.en:
Basma, from Madaba, Jordan, is a 42 year-old married woman and a mother of four chldren.   Basma started her business of sewing clothes from home years ago.   Then she expanded her project to include the used clothes trade.

Basma is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase a sewing machine and more used clothes.   An aspiration of Basma is to expand her business and increase her family living standards.

loans.use: to purchase additional used clothes and a sewing machine

loans.name: Jose Edilberto

texts.es:
José, vive con sus padres y hermanos, es soltero, trabaja desde hace 3 años en una agencia de viajes, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00am a 4:00pm, él cubre todos sus gastos y colabora con su familia para los gastos del hogar.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la reparación de una motocicleta, la cual se encarga de transportarlo hacia su trabajo y viceversa, este préstamo le ayudara a cubrir los gastos de repuestos y mano de obra para la reparación de la motocicleta, manteniéndola en buenas condiciones para usarla.
Su objetivo es superarse en el trabajo, contar con buenas condiciones de vida, apoyar a su familia y ahorrar dinero para realizar su propia vida en un futuro.
texts.en:
José, who lives with his parents and siblings, is single. He has worked in a travel agency for three years. His work schedule is from 8:00 am to 4:00 pm. He covers all of his own costs and helps his family with the household costs.
He is requesting a loan for repairing a motorcycle, which he uses to go back and forth to work. This loan will help him to cover the costs of the parts and labour for the motorcycle repair. This will keep it in good condition for use.
His goal is to get ahead in his job, have good living conditions, support his family and save money to have his own life in the future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and pay for the repair of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Virgen Del Pilar Group

texts.es:
El comité de Mujeres de nombre Virgen del Pilar, se conformó en el año 2009 con mucho esfuerzo y esmero. Actualmente están en el cuarto ciclo, cuenta con 12 miembros, donde todas trabajan en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
La Señora Digna, quien se dedica a la venta de chipa (comida típica paraguaya) sale todos los días a muy tempranas horas de la mañana a vender sus productos. Anteriormente solo vendía los sábados, pero ahora vende todos los días. Ella trabaja sacrificadamente para buscar mayores ingresos y de esa forma solventar los gastos que tiene en la casa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los ingredientes que necesita para la elaboración de las chipas, como ser harina de maíz, huevo, anís. Desde ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, ya que por medio del crédito podrá aumentar la cantidad de insumos que tiene y así satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The 'Virgen del Pilar' women's committee was formed in 2009 with a lot of care and effort.  They are currently in their fourth loan cycle.  The group has 12 members who work jointly and in a supportive manner within the program.

Digna sells 'chipa' (typical Paraguayan food).  She used to only sell on Saturdays but now she sells every day of the week.  She works with a great deal of sacrifice, looking to make more income so that she can cover her household expenses.

Digna is requesting this loan to buy the ingredients she needs for making 'chipas' (cheese buns) such as cornmeal, eggs and aniseed.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her as this loan will enable her to increase the quantity of supplies that she has available.

loans.use: compra de harina de maíz, huevos, anís y demás para elaboración de las chipas

loans.name: Mo'ath

texts.en:
Mo'ath, from Madab, Jordan, is a 21 year-old single man.  He has a shop for selling and purchasing computers and accessories and is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to purchase more products for the shop.

Mo'ath started his business 5 years ago as computer maintainance only, but, after taking his first loan from Tamweelcom, he was able to purchase computers and then sell them at the market.  An aspiration of Mo'ath is to increase his family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase computer products

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth tiene 38 años, es una mujer cordial y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Nelson de 49 años y fruto de esa relación concibieron 02 hijos, a quienes les brinda una educación justa. Ruth es una mujer responsable tanto en su trabajo como en su hogar, por ello se despierta  muy temprano para dirigirse a su puesto y abrir las puertas de su tienda en espera de sus primeros consumidores. Desde sus 30 años viene dedicándose en la de venta de productos de primera necesidad, tales como: sacos de arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, detergentes y entre otros. Se siente muy contenta con la actividad que realiza, por que gracias a ello pudo comprar su propio lote de terreno y con ello también sustenta los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Su  puesto de ventas se sitúa en la zona céntrica de la ciudad de Quimbiri donde ella les brinda una atención adecuada. Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado, comprará mayor cantidad de víveres y así implementar su bodega con productos. Este será su séptimo crédito y ya se siente contento al saber que en esta oportunidad también contará con el apoyo financiero para llevar consigo  su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente como solía hacer en los anteriores créditos. Con el monto requerido adquirirá mercadería de primera necesidad como: arroz, aceite, pasta dental, leche,  y detergentes.
texts.en:
Ruth, 38, is a courteous, hard working woman.  She lives in her own house with her husband, Nelson, 49.  They have two children that she provides a proper education for.  Ruth is a responsible woman both at work and in her home.  Because of this, she rises very early to take her position and open up the doors of her store awaiting her first customers of the day.  She’s been selling groceries like sacks of rice, sugar, noodles, milk and detergents, among others, since she was 30 years old.  She feels very happy with the work she does because thanks to it she was able to buy her own plot of land and she can also pay for her beloved children’s education.

Her sales stand is located in the central part of the city of Quimbiri where she provides adequate attention.  With support from the loan she will buy larger amounts of foodstuffs to stock her store with merchandise.

This will be her 7th loan and she feels happy to know that on this occasion she will once again have financial support to reach her goal.  In addition, she commits to make her installment payments punctually like she tended to do in previous loans.  She will use the requested amount to buy basic need merchandise like: rice, oil, toothpaste, milk and detergents.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, sugar, milk, toothpaste and detergents.

loans.name: Gladys Yolanda

texts.es:
La Sra. Gladys tiene 52 años, está casada y con dos hijos, ellos viven en la ciudad D. villa Elisa.
Gladys es una conocida peluquera D. su barrio y la mayoria D. los vecinos son sus clientes. Se dedica al rubro dese hace 25 años, brindando a sus clientes un excelente servicio.
Ella se considera una mujer muy trabajadora y solidaria con los demás. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por el bien D. sus hijos, para que puedan estudiar una carrera universitaria y convertirse en personas D. bien. Desea brindarle la educación a la que ella no tuvo acceso, como así también un nivel D. vida modesto, pero sin necesidades.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra D. colorantes, tintes, shampoo, enjuagues y otros productos que utiliza en su salón D. belleza.
texts.en:
Sra. Gladys is 52 years old, married, and has two children. They live in the city of Villa Elisa.

Gladys is a recognized stylist in her neighborhood and most of her neighbors are her customers. She has been in this line of work for 25 years and provides her customers with excellent service. Gladys is considered to be a hardworking woman who is supportive of others. She says that everything she does is for the sake of her children, who are studying for university degrees so that they can become successful people. Gladys wants to proviD. them the education that she was not able to achieve as well as a modest standard of a living that does not lack the basic necessities.

She is requesting a loan to buy colorings, dyes, shampoos, conditioners, and other products used in her beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase colorings, dyes, shampoos, conditioners, and other products.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah, from Madab, Jordan, is a 51 year-old married woman and a mother of three children.  Ten years ago, Sarah started her business from home, and then expanded it to a licensed store.  Sarah has a grocery shop and requesting a loan 600 JD to purchase products for the store.

Sarah is looking to expand her business in order to add a refrigerator for the frozen food.  She also hopes to help her daughter to continue her studies at university.

loans.use: to purchase grocery products

loans.name: Susan

texts.es: Susan, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri de 30 años de edad, cuenta con casa propia y es una mujer que se entrega por completo a su trabajo, convive con su pareja Octavio de 33 años y fruto de ese amorío tienen 01 hijo a quien desean brindarle un buen provenir. Susan es una mujer creativa sabe como emplear su tiempo, desde las 06 de la mañana hasta las 02 de la tarde trabaja como cocinera en distintos restaurantes y a partir de las 04 de la tarde se dedica a vender ropa por medio de un catálogo, de esta manera es como se desenvuelve su rutinaria vida. Le gusta la forma en que trabaja y diversifica su tiempo así dependiendo de 02 ingresos, en la cocina prepara exquisitos potajes al gusto del cliente y a la hora de salir a ofrecer las prendas lo hace con mucha cordialidad, mostrando ropa novedosa que son del agrado para sus clientes. Asimismo nos menciona, que la estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque los caminos por donde surca están llenas de lodo, e impidiendo el avance hacía las casas de sus clientes. Ella agradece el apoyo de todos ustedes, porque gracias a ello obtuvo el pequeño capital para la adquisición de ropa y es así que ella va sobresaliendo de la pobreza que aqueja su hogar. Su mayor deseo es exhibir con el tiempo las prendas de vestir en un centro comercial donde pueda trabajar tranquilamente. Este será su cuarto crédito y esta contenta de poder trabajar con los préstamos que puedan ustedes facilitar, ya que así podrá tener más oportunidad de desarrollarse como comerciante. Con el monto solicitado lo empleará para viajar a la ciudad de lima para luego comprar variedad de ropa.
texts.en:
Susan is from the city of Quimbiri.  She’s 30 years old.  She has a house of her own and she’s a woman who is completely dedicated to her work.  She lives with Octavio, 33, and their son that she wants to provide a good future for.  

Susan is a creative woman who knows how to use her time well.  From 6am until 2pm she works as a cook in different restaurants and after four in the afternoon she sells clothes via catalogue.  This is what her daily routine is like.

She likes the way she works and divides her time between two sources of income.  In the kitchens she prepress delicious stews according to the customer’s taste and when she gets off work she goes out to offer her articles of clothing very courteously displaying clothes that are novel and to the customers’ liking.  She also mentions that this winter season isn’t much to her liking because the roads she must travel are full of mud impeding her approach to her customers’ homes.

She is grateful for all of your help because thanks to it she obtained the small capital to acquire clothes and this is how she is overcoming the poverty that afflicts her home.  Her greatest wish is to eventually display her clothes in a shopping center where she can work with more tranquility.

This will be her 4th loan and she is happy to work with the loans that you make possible because she’ll have more opportunities to develop as a merchant.  She will use the requested amount to travel to the city of Lima to buy an assortment of clothes.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Nuestra Señora De Guadalupe Group

texts.es: El Banco de comunal Nuestra Señora De Guadalupe está conformado por 9 Integrantes todas son Mujeres y las señoras se dedican al comercio y venta de pescado y otros, y Señora Gloria es la presidenta del Banco tiene dos hijos y ella se dedica a una pulpería, actividad donde le va muy bien y con el préstamo comprara granos básicos, jugos, refrescos, papel higiénico, fósforos sal y pan. Es una persona muy trabajadora y siempre pensando en el bienestar de sus hijos, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The Our Lady of Guadalupe Communal Bank consists of 9 members, all of whom are women. They dedicate themselves to their businesses, selling fish among other things. Señora Gloria is the president of the bank. She has 2 children and runs a grocery store, which is going well. With the loan she plans to buy grain, juices, sodas, toilet paper, matches, salt and bread. She is a very hard-working person, always thinking of her children's well-being. She is grateful to the organisation for the support offered.

loans.use: To buy grain, juices, sodas, toilet paper, matches, salt and bread.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama is married and has six children. She makes corn dough and cassava dough for sale at Elmina, which she has done for eight years. Her husband is a farmer. 

Ama uses her income to support her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Ama will use the loan to purchase maize to make corn dough and cassava for cassava dough. With the new profits from her expanded business, Ama wishes to reinvest back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize to make corn dough and cassava for cassava dough.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama is married and blessed with one child. Her husband is a farmer. Ama sells cassava, cooking oil, maize, and other items at Elmina. She helps her husband pay for utility bills and other household expenses. In this picture, Ama is squatting close to the maize she sells. 

Ama is requesting a loan to buy more goods to sell. She hopes to use the profits from her business to save toward the university education of her child.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El Sr. Gregorio es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, es casado, el vive con su Sra. y un hijo en casa propia.
Gregorio se dedica a  trabajos de plomería, construcción y reparación de viviendas. Hace mas de 3 años que trabaja en esta rama. Gracias a este trabajo y al apoyo de su esposa pueden solventar juntos los gastos que implican mantener a una familia.
El nos dice que se considera una persona muy trabajadora y sacrificada, ya que las profesiones a la que se dedica son muy pesadas y necesitan de la utilización de mucha fuerza física, pero manifiesta que todo sacrificio es poco por su hijo.
El solicita el credito para la compra de herramientas que utiliza dentro de su profesión. Esta muy agradecido por la oportunidad que le da Fundación Paraguaya.
texts.en:
Sr. Gregorio is from the city of San Ignacio. He is married and lives in his own home with his wife and child.

Gregorio performs plumbing, construction, and home repair work. He has been in this profession for more than three years. Thanks to his work and the support of his wife, they are able to afford the expenses required to maintain their family.

Gregorio says he considers himself to be a hardworking and self-sacrificing person. His job is very demanding and requires a great amount of physical effort, but he believes this is a small sacrifice for him to support his child.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy equipment that he will use for his job. He is very grateful for the opportunity provided by Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to purchase plumbing equipment.

loans.name: Reintegracion Group

texts.es:
El grupo Reintegración lo conforman cuatro mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora es la señora María Elena de 42 años comerciante de ropa y zapatos desde hace 7 años el cual inicio con unos ahorros y luego lo fue aumentando. El sueño de ella es llegar a tener una tienda en su casa. 
Las otras integrantes son Deysi María tiene una tienda de ropa usada desde hace 2 años, Ingrid de 40 años se dedica al comercio de verduras desde hace 3 años, y Concepción ella es costurera y vende materiales de costura (telas, hilos, aguja, cintas, aplicaciones, bordados…etc.
texts.en:
The Reintegracion group is made up of four hard-working and enterprising women. The coordinator is Mrs. Maria Elena, age 42, who has sold clothing and shoes for 7 years. She started this business with her savings and it has been growing. Her dream is to have a store in her home. 
The other members are Deysi Maria, who has had a used clothing store for 2 years; Ingrid, age 40, who has sold vegetables for 3 years; and Concepcion, who is a seamstress and sells sewing materials (fabric, thread, needles, ribbon, applications, embroidering, etc).

loans.use: to purchase merchandise; clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Conquistadoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CONQUISTADORAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Irene. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: producción de mantas, venta de estuco, venta de bayetas y mantas, elaboración de mantas y chompas, venta de polleras faldas y mantillas, atención de pensión, tintorería y limpieza, fabricación de ladrillos

La señora Irene,  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una de las socias. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de polleras y mantas que viene trabajando hace tres años atrás, cuando aprendió a tejer macramé en una capacitación. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de telas, y lana) que comprará de la 16 de julio y lo venderá en el departamento de Oruro. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella vive en unión libre  y tiene tres hijos.  

En la fotografia nos acompaña la prima de una de las socias, ella se encuentra en la esquina "escondida"
texts.en:
The "Conquistadoras" Community Bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Senkata. It is made up of ten members and is governed by a board of directors headed by Mrs. Irene. The members' businesses are varied and include: making blankets; selling plaster; selling cloths and blankets; making blankets and jackets; selling skirts, dresses and baby clothing; a guesthouse; dry cleaning and cleaning; and brick-making.

Mrs. Irene says that this is her first cycle working with Pro Mujer, and she joined at the invitation of the members. She currently has a business making skirts and blankets, which she has done for three years after learning to weave macrame in a workshop.

The loan that she will now take out is to increase her working capital, buying fabrics ans wool, which she will buy from the 16th of July area and sell in the department of Oruro. This work allows her to generate an income to support her family where possible. She lives with her partner and has three children.

The cousin of one of the members is also in the photo. She is "hiding" in the corner.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and wool

loans.name: Serah

texts.en: Serah is married and has seven children. She sells cassava, maize and salted fish in Elmina, which she has done for seven years. Her husband is a farmer. She helps her husband pay the school fees and utility bills. Serah will use this loan to purchase extra quantities of salted fish to sell. She wishes to reinvest her new profit.

loans.use: to purchase extra quantities of salted fish to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married and has five children. She is married to a farmer. For the past 11 years, Elizabeth has lived in Elmina. She sells ladies underwear and uses her income to support her family and help pay school fees and utility bills. 

Elizabeth is requesting a loan to buy ladies underwear to sell. With the profit from her expanded business, Elizabeth plans to save to open a shop.

loans.use: to buy ladies underwear to sell

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. For the past three years, Cecelia has been working as a seamstress. In addition, she sells cassava and plantain in the town of Elmina, a fishing community on the Cape Coast. Cecelia’s income helps pay utility bills and other household expenses. 

Cecelia is requesting a loan to buy more materials to sew and meet the demands of her customers. She hopes to use the profits from her business to build a shop.

loans.use: to buy materials to meet customer demand

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es: Teofila tiene 32 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su propia casa situada en la ciudad de Quimbiri junto a su conviviente Alberto de 38 años y lo que más desean es sacar adelante a sus 02 queridos hijos y así poder vivir una vejez tranquila. Teofila anteriormente laboraba en diferentes trabajos, pero siempre anhelaba contar con su propio negocio. Es así que con sus ahorros acumulados más con el apoyo de su pareja pudo tener un bazar de ropa. Actualmente su puesto es muy concurrido por sus clientes, ya que ofrece ropa de primera calidad, ella es una persona muy atenta pues siempre recibe a sus clientes cordialmente dispuesta a ayudarles en sus compras, y así estén satisfechos. Su negocio es muy ordenado y apreciado por su clientela; su comercio lo realiza en la ciudad de Quimbiri, donde la atención es de primera calidad, el trabajo lo cumple en compañía de su pareja donde llevan trabajando 09 años. Con el crédito, comprará ganchos y andamios para exhibir mejor sus prendas. Este es su tercer crédito, esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir avanzando. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará prendas de vestir y para ello viajará a la ciudad de lima.
texts.en:
Teofila is 32 years old. She is a very hard-working woman, who lives in her own house in the city of Quimbiri together with her partner Alberto, who is 38. What they want most is to help their two children to get on well in life and so be able to live to a peaceful old age. Teofila has previously worked in a number of different jobs, but always longed to have her own business. With her savings and the support of her partner, she therefore opened a clothing stall. Her stall is now well frequented by her customers, since she offers top-quality clothing and because she is a very attentive salesperson. She always welcomes her customers cordially and puts herself at their disposal while they make their purchases, and so they are satisfied customers.

Her business is always kept tidy, which is appreciated by the clientele; she trades in the city of Quimbiri, where people pay attention to quality. Teofila and her partner have had the business for 9 years now. With the loan, Teofila plans to buy hangers and rails to better display her garments. This is her third loan. She is very happy to know that she can once again count on your support. With the new loan of 2,000 Soles, she will travel to the city of Lima and buy items of clothing there.

loans.use: To travel to the city of Lima to buy more items of clothing.

loans.name: Mujeres En Acción Group

texts.es:
La formación del presente comité se inicio gracias a la Señora Rosalina, ella contacto con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en su comunidad. Nombraron al comité Mujeres en Acción. Se encuentran actualmente en el Segundo Ciclo cuentan con 21 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy activas y responsable entre ellas y en su comunidad.
LA Sra Rosalina se dedica a la venta de frutas. Ella comenta que es un trabajo un poco pesado, ya que todos los días debe levantarse a tempranas horas para compras las frutas que va a vender. Ella manifiesta que todo lo que hace es por el bien de su familia y por procurar llevar mas ingresos a la casa.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de frutas, con lo cual podrá aumentar el stock que tiene, para que no quede desabastecida cuando los clientes le demanden.
texts.en:
The present committee was formed thanks to the initiative of Señora Rosalina.  She contacted her neighbors and friends to form this group in her community.  They named the committee Mujeres en Acción [Women in Action].  They are currently in their second cycle and have 21 members.  They are a group that stands out in their neighborhood for being very active and responsible among themselves and within their community.  

Señora Rosalina sells fruit for a living.  She says that her job is a bit burdensome as she has to get up early everyday to buy the fruit that she is going to sell.  She says that everything she does is for the well-being of her family and to bring in more income.  

She is requesting a loan to buy fruit.  This will allow her to increase her stock so that she can have a supply to meet her customer's demands.

loans.use: purchase fruit to sell.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.es: Luciano y su esposa la señora María Elena son una pareja muy estable que desea ofrecer a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida al igual que brindarles protección, la casa que tienen se encuentra ubicada en una calle muy transitada y los niños están pequeños;  por lo que tuvieron que poner  por lo pronto una barda de tarimas ya que temían que se salieran y algún automóvil los pudiera atropellar. Luciano viendo la necesidad que la madera que puso no es de buena calidad, el opto por instalar una barda de block y protecciones para que estuviera mejor cimentada y dar una mejor vista a su vivienda al igual que proteger a su familia de cualquier accidente como algún robo. Para poder lograr su proyecto el necesita comprar material de construcción y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Luciano and his wife Maria Elena are a very stable couple who want to offer their 2 children a better quality of life and also provide them with protection.   The house they have is located on a busy street and the children are small.  So they had to put up a fence of wood planks for the time being as they feared that as cars came out they could run over the children.  Luciano sees that the wood that he put up is not of good quality, so he is choosing to install a block wall to be better grounded and give a better view of  their home as well as protect his family from any accident, such as a theft. To accomplish his project, he needs to buy building materials and pay for hired laborers.

loans.use: to put up a wall.

loans.name: Ana Lucila

texts.es:
Ana, es comerciante, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, todos trabajan en su familia, y ella venD. ropa, este negocio lo estableció gracias al apoyo D. su madre, pues contaba con experiencia en este tipo D. venta para apoyarla, no tiene horario estable pues todo depenD. D. la demanda.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar ropa, específicamente blusas, ropa interior, esta compra le ayudara a abastecer su negocio, ofrecer a los clientes mercadería nueva, permitiéndose crecer y mejorar su servicio a los clientes.
Para Ana su objetivo es tener el negocio abastecido, que los clientes se sientan satisfechos con la mercadería que ella ofrece, aumentar las ventas y así mismo tener una mejor oportunidad D. superación con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is a businesswoman who lives with her ​​husband and two sons.  They all work in her family, and she sells clothes.  This business was established with support from her mother because she had experience in this type of sale to support it.  Ana doesn't have a stable timetable because her work depends on demand.

Ana is currently seeking a loan to buy clothes, specifically shirts and underwear.  This purchase will help supply her business and offer customers new merchandise, enabling her to grow and improve her service to customers.

Ana's goals are to supply her business so that customers are satisfied with the merchandise it offers, increase sales and also have a better chance of overcoming challenges with her family.

loans.use: to purchase shirts and underwear to sell.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es: Violeta tiene 61 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Alejandro de 63 años, con el esfuerzo de su trabajo lograron educar a sus 05 hijos, ahora ellos ya son independientes y tienen su propia familia. Violeta ejemplo a seguir, una madre coraje que su supo aprovechar las fuerzas de su juventud, trabajó de distintas formas para educar a sus hijos, hoy sus hijos agradecen a sus padres por el apoyo brindado. Hoy en día aunque sus hijos no le permiten que trabaje, pero ella quiere seguir beneficiándose de la buena salud que goza. Desde hace 03 años acondiciono os espacios de su vivienda para ofrecer todo tipo de bebidas, hoy su establecimiento es muy concurrido y le falta mano para atender a sus consumidores. Desde que se entero que la institución MFP apoya a los más necesitados no dudo en participar y solicitar su crédito. Este será su tercer crédito y espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continúe trabajando. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará mesas y sillas para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Violeta is 61, and a working woman who lives at home with her husband Alexander, 63.  With hard work they were able to educate their 5 children, who now are already independent and have their own family. Violeta is an example to follow, she is a courageous mother who knew how to take advantage of her youth.  She worked in various ways to educate their children, and now their children thank their parents for their support. 

Today, even though her children don't allow her to work, she wants to continue to benefit from the good health she enjoys. For 3 years she air-conditioned spaces in her home to offer all types of beverages.  Today, her establishment is crowded and lacks the help to serve her customers. Since she found out that the MFP institution supports those in need, she did not hesitate to participate and apply for credit. This will be her third loan and she  hopes for the support of every one of you to continue working. With the requested loan, whe will purchase tables and chairs to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for her establishment.

loans.name: Belen

texts.es: La señora Belen es una mujer muy responsable que ha dedicado su vida por más de 21 años a trabajado para una maquiladora de la ciudad para poder sostener los gastos del hogar al igual que su esposo ya que de esta manera es como se ayudan mutuamente. Desde hace 19 años adquirieron su vivienda de interés social y que con el tiempo el techo de la misma se ha ido deteriorando por lo que Belen se ve en la necesidad de reconstruirlo ya que es su único patrimonio que les podrá ofrecer a sus dos hijos. Para arreglar su techo necesita comprar material de construcción y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Belen is a very responsible woman who has dedicated her life for over 21 years working for a factory in the city to pay for household expenses.  Her husband also does this, as this is how they help each other. For 19 years they got affordable housing and over time the roof of their house has deteriorated so Belen needs to rebuild it, as it is their only asset they can offer their two children. To fix the roof she needs to buy building materials and pay for labor.

loans.use: to rebuild the roof of her house.

loans.name: Panqaritas De 25 De Julio Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PANQARITAS DE 25 DE JULIO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Elsa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: elaboración de combinaciones y mantas, producción de mantas, faldas y polleras de cholitas, semillas para chacra, venta de mantas de vicuña, venta de cosméticos, tienda de repuestos, chaperia

La señora Elsa  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de combinaciones que viene trabajando hace muchos años atrás, aprendo este oficio de sus compañeras. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de telas y lana) que comprará de los mayoristas. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta salud
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Panqaritas de 25 de Julio" will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of Senkata Center.  The group consists of nine members and is headed by a board headed by Elsa.  The businesses that communal bank members work in are varied.  Among them are: decorating combinations and blankets, producing blankets, skirts and petticoats, planting seeds, selling vicuña(alpaca) rugs, selling cosmetics, an auto parts store, and autobody services.

Elsa indicates that this is her first cycle working with Pro Mujer, at the invitation of a promoter. She is currently developing a business of decorating combinations that has been working on for many years.  She learned this trade from her peers.

The requested loan is to raise capital (purchase of fabrics and wool) that she will buy from wholesalers. This workflow allows her to generate resources to support her family as much as possible, as she is married and has six children.

When asked what he likes about Pro Mujer, Elsa replies that she likes good health.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Diana Marisol

texts.es:
Diana, es comerciante de ropa, vive con su abuela y unos tíos, es soltera, ella inicio el negocio por el apoyo de una Tía, trabaja sin horario, y por el momento todo ha marchado bien en el negocio.
Ella tiene la iniciativa de invertir en mercadería para aumentar el negocio, para llevarlo a cabo solicita un préstamo y comprar con él prendas de vestir como: blusas, faldas, ropa interior, esta compra le ayudara grandemente para atender mejor a los clientes.
Diana tiene un objetivo de superación y es el de instalar una tienda donde pueda estar fija, ofreciendo a los clientes una mejor atención, mercadería de calidad y moda, con esto estaría creciendo en el comercio y económicamente.
texts.en:
Diana is a clothes merchant.  She lives with her grandmother and some aunts and uncles.  She is single.  She started the business with help from an aunt.  She works with no fixed schedule.  For the moment everything has gone well with the business.

She has the initiative to invest in merchandise to expand the business.  To do so, she’s asking for a loan to buy articles of clothing like: blouses, skirts and underwear.  This purchase will help her much to better tend to her customers.  Diana has a self improvement goal: to set up a store where she can be established in one place offering her customers better service and higher quality, stylish merchandise.  With this, she’d be growing in business and economically.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Ligia Mercedes

texts.es: Ligia Mercedes se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Con mucho esfuerzo es que ha podido continuar con este negocio. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio.  Cuenta con este negocio, el cual poco a poco ha ido sacando adelante, surtiéndolo con lo que ha sido posible para ella, ya que esto es bastante difícil, ya que la mayoría de las ganancias son para su negocio. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos como bolsos, calzado, cremas, ropa en general y otros productos.
texts.en: Ligia Mercedes sells general merchandise.  This is not her first loan request.  With much effort she’s managed to stay in business.  She’s been in business for over three years.  She has this business that she’s gradually moved ahead stocking it with whatever she could since this is quite difficult since most of her profits go back into the business.  Because of this she’s asking for a loan to be able to buy larger amounts of products like purses, footwear, creams, clothes in general and other products.

loans.use: to buy purses, footwear, creams, clothing in general and other products.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es una madre de familia de 2 pequeños que ha salido adelante sola ya que hace varios años se divorcio de su marido pero esto no la detuvo para sostener a sus hijos.
En este momento Manuela se ve en la necesidad de construir su barda enfrente de su vivienda para que este mejor protegida de algún delincuente que quiera aprovecharse de la situación. Hace tiempo la señora Manuela compro block  para comenzar la construcción pero por falta de capital no ha terminado por eso solicita del apoyo para comprar el material que le falto y pagar mano de obra y de esta manera ofrecerá a su familia protección.
texts.en:
Manuela is the mother of two little ones.  She’s gotten ahead on her own because she was divorced from her husband several years ago.  However, this did not hold her back from supporting her children.

At present, Manuela needs to erect a front wall on her property so that her house will be better protected for any delinquent that might want to take advantage of the situation.  Some time ago Manuela purchased concrete block to start the construction project but lack of capital has stopped her from finishing it.  This is why she’s asking for your help to buy the supplies she still needs and to pay labor costs for the project and thus provide her family with enhanced protection.

loans.use: to erect a wall.

loans.name: Yessica

texts.es: Yessica tiene 37 años, es una mujer  trabajadora vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Raúl de 40 años de edad y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes les esta brindando una buena educación. Yessica, cuenta con muchos proyectos en mente, para sobre salir de la pobreza que aqueja su hogar, ella se dedica en la venta de conservas, leche, detergentes, embutidos, productos que la brindan una buena sostenibilidad económica para mejorar su condición de vida. Viene trabajando 08 años en este negocio y en sus días libres aprovecha para apoyar en los trabajos a su amado esposo quien se dedica en labrar la tierra, y con sus ingresos cubren los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Yessica necesita el apoyo de la entidad financiera para mejorar las fachadas de su vivienda y por ello acude a los préstamos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas mas necesitadas con miras a progresar e invertir su dinero en beneficio de si mismos. Por tanto desea comprar cementos, clavos y ventanas para así brindarles un buen techo a los miembros de su familia. Espera trabajar con el mismo impulso en su negocio y comprar posteriormente más materiales de construcción. Este será su segundo crédito  y por lo cual necesita el apoyo de ustedes para concretar sus planes a la vez se compromete en pagar muy puntualmente sus cronogramas de pago. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles que solicita, refaccionará  su morada y  comprará,  cementos, clavos y ventanas para mejorar el entorno de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yessica, 37, is a hard working woman living in her own house with her spouse, Raúl, 40, and their three beloved children that she’s providing a good education for.  Yessica has lots of projects in mind to overcome the poverty that afflicts her home.  She sells canned food, milk, detergent, cured meats; products that provide her with good economic support to improve her living conditions.  She’s been working for 8 years and on her time off she helps her beloved husband with his work in the fields.  They use their income to pay for the educational costs of their beloved children.

Yessica needs help from the financial institution to improve her home’s façade and this is why she’s turning to MFP’s loans, an institution that helps out people with needs who aim to make progress and invest their money to better themselves.

She wants to buy cement, nails and windows to provide a good roof over her family’s heads.  She hopes to work with the same impulse in her business and to later on buy more building materials and supplies.  

This will be her 2nd loan so she needs help from all of you to make her plans real.  At the same time, she commits to repay her loan punctually according to the payment schedule.  She will use the requested 1000 new soles to do some home improvements.  She will buy cement, nails and windows to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, nails and windows.

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
Confiadas que unidas podrían alcanzar sus metas y con el apoyo mutuo, en la ciudad de Caaguazú se formo un comité llamado Primavera, con 20 señoras humildes y trabajadoras con el fin de obtener un pequeño ingreso para cubrir las necesidades de los hogares de cada una.
Ellas se definen como mujeres luchadoras y trabajadoras, tratan de llevar el pan de cada día por medio del esfuerzo mutuo y la cooperación.
La Sra Mary tiene un pequeño almacén que le sirve de sustento, por medio de el logra cubrir las mínimas necesidades de la familia. Sueña con algún día poder ampliar su negocio para tener mas espacio donde exponer sus mercaderías.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lácteos y demás para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Certain that as a united group they could achieve their goals and with mutual support, a committee called 'Primavera' (Spring) was established in the city of Caaguazú.  The group is made up of 20 humble and hard-working ladies who have the common goal of making a small income to cover their household needs.

The members of this committee describe themselves as tenacious and hard-working women who try to earn a daily living through their mutual effort and cooperation.

Mary owns a small store with which she supports herself.  Through her business, she manages to cover the basic needs of her family.  She dreams of some day expanding her business so that she can have more space in which to display her merchandise.

Mary is requesting a loan to buy drinks, food, dairy products, etc. with which to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy drinks, food, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: La señora Laura es una mujer muy emprendedora que se dedica la venta por catalogo y joyería de plata que ofrece de casa en casa, familiares y amigos a pagos accesibles, por lo que en este momento desea comprar mayor mercancía para su propia venta para tener mayor ganancia. Lo que hace Laura es comprar con el monto solicitado para productos de los catálogos que le ofrece la misma empresa mas económico y luego lo vende al precio normal  pero recibiendo una mejor ganancia para ella. De esta manera es como recibe ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Laura is a very enterprising woman who sells silver jewelry via catalogue door to door to family members and friends with comfortable payment plans.  Because of this at present she wants to buy larger amounts of merchandise to sell and have higher profits.

What Laura does is buy with the requested amount products from the catalogue that the same firm offers at more economical prices and then she resells them at the regular price thereby earning better profits for herself.   This is how she earns income to help her husband with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.
