loans.name: Escogidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Escogidas lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Rosa Adelia de 33 años quien se dedica a la elaboración de cepillos de lavar ropa y cepillo de lustrar desde hace 7 años. Este negocio lo inicio para pasar más tiempo con sus hijos de 13, 10 y 7 años de edad.  
El crédito lo invertirá en materiales estos son; taco, alambre, madera, nailon y pelo etc. y su meta es crecer.
Las otras integrantes son María Alicia de 56 años  e Iris Nubia de 51 años. La señora María trabajaba como doméstica y en su tiempo libre le ayudaba a un familiar que vendía leña, como vio que el negocio era bueno  con unos ahorros compro un caballo, una carreta y contrato un mozo e inicio su negocio.   Iris vende tortillas, cosa de horno y pan de harina, esto lo aprendió de su abuelita y a la edad de 21 años inicio su negocio.
texts.en:
The “Las Escogidas” (The Chosen Ones) group is composed of three hard working, enterprising women.  One of them is Rosa Adelia, 33, who has been manufacturing brushes to wash clothes and polishing brushes for the last 7 years.  She started the business in order to be able to spend more time with her children who are 13, 10 and 7 years of age. She will use the loan to buy raw materials like: handles, wire, wood, nylon, bristles, etc.

The other group members are María Alicia, 56 and Iris Nubia, 51.  María works as a domestic employee and in her free time would help a relative that sells firewood.  Seeing that this is a profitable business she used some savings to buy a horse and a cart, hired a helper, and started her business.  Iris sells tortillas, baked goods and flour bread.  She learned this from her grandmother and started the business when she was 21 years old.

loans.use: to buy brush making supplies.

loans.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es: La señora Maria Ignacia cuenta con negocio desde hace 8 años denominado  “Miscelánea El Pelao”  donde ofrece a sus cliente abarrotes en general como botanas, refrescos. La señora recurre a esta institución para pedir apoyo para surtir su negocio y así obtener mayores ganancias para poder sustentar los gastos de su familia.
texts.en: Maria Ignacia has owned her business, a general store called "Miscelánea El Pelao", for 8 years. She sells basic grocery items, such as snacks and sodas. Maria Ignacia is applying for a loan from this institution to help her stock her business and generate better income so that she can cover her family's financial needs.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
La Sra. Blanca está casada con Don Roberto, tienen 3 hijos menores, ellos son su compañía y el motivo de su lucha de todos los días, procurando poder darles lo mejor. 
Ella tiene una despensa bien surtida y muy conocida en el barrio. Su hija mayor tiene 14 años y le ayuda en con las tareas en la despensa. Consiguió montar su despensa con un poco de dinero que le había regalado su padre para poder iniciar su negocio. Ademas de su hija su marido también la ayuda dentro del negocio. Ella sueña con algún día poder expandir un poco mas su almacén. 
Ella solicita el credito para comprar carne, harina, azúcar y demás productor para mantener surtido su local. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
Blanca is married to Roberto and they have three dependent children.  They are her company and her motivation to work hard every day, trying to provide them with the best in life.

Blanca has a well-stocked grocery store which is very well known in her neighborhood.  Her eldest daughter is 14 years old and helps her with her work in the store.  Blanca managed to set up her store with a little bit of money that her father had given her to start a business with.  In addition to her daughter, Blanca's husband also helps her in the business.  She dreams of some day expanding her store a little more.

Blanca is requesting this loan to buy meat, flour, sugar and other products to keep her store well stocked.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy meat, flour, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es: La Señora Mariana vive en la zona de villa salome que esta ubicada a veinticinco minutos del centro de la ciudad, Ella vive junto a sus dos hijos, uno que ya es independiente y una menor que se encuentra estudiando en nivel secundario. La Sra. Mariana vende comida variedad de platillos como ser silpancho y asado en un puesto que tiene en su casa, abre su tienda solo por  las noches y tienen varios clientes. Ella trabaja con créditos en emprender desde el año 2005 y en todos estos años a demostrado ser una cliente muy responsable y puntual con sus cuotas. En esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo para la compra de una computadora personal laptop que será utilizada en los estudios de su hijo mayor. El mayor anhelo y deseo de doña Mariana es poder algún día ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en:
Mariana lives in a zone called Villa Salome located 25 minutes outside the city center. She lives with her two children; one is already financially independent and the younger child is in secondary school. Mariana sells a variety of fast food such as silpancho (thinly sliced, breaded meat) and barbecued meat from a stand at her house. The stand is open in the evenings and has a number of different customers. 

She has been a client of Emprender since 2005 and over the years she has proven to be a very responsible client who is punctual with her repayments. Marinana is requesting a loan to buy a personal laptop computer for her eldest child's studies. Her greatest wish is to see her children achieve professional careers.

loans.use: To buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys tiene 39 años, viven con su esposo y el menor de sus dos hijos, en su casa que es propia. Tiene 17 años sembrando trigo, cebada habas y papa, por lo que ha logrado fortalecer la economía de su hogar. Es así que todos los días se encarga de hacer un recorrido por sus tierras de cultivo, una vez llegada la temporada de cosecha tiene la tarea de llenarlos en costales para llevarlos todos los fines de semana a la feria comercial de su ciudad. De esa manera tiene las ganancias que necesita para cubrir las necesidades de su familia. Se siente muy contenta de realizar este trabajo porque le permite estar disfrutando del paisaje y aunque el trabajo sea muy  fatigoso es su forma de vida. Para los próximos años su deseo es  sembrar mayor cantidad de extensiones de tierra para obtener más ganancias. Es una de las socias que ha permanecido a lo largo de los años trabajando con MFP, en todo este tiempo ha demostrado puntualidad en sus pagos y en las actividades que ha realizado como grupo por lo que continuará con esta mística de mejoramiento continuo en todo lo que emprenda. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Gladys is 39 years old and lives with her ​​husband and their two youngest children at home, which is their own house. She has 17 years of experience planting wheat, barley, beans and potatoes, which has strengthened their home finances. Everyday, Gladys goes on a tour of their farms.  Once the harvest season has arrived, she has the task of filling up bags to bring on weekends to the trade fair in their city. 

In this way, Gladys has the profits needed to meet the needs of her family.  She feels very happy to do this work because it allows her to enjoy the scenery and although the work is very tiring,  this is her way of life.  In the coming years, her desire is to plant more tracts of land for more profit.  Gladys is one of the members who has remained throughout the years working with MFP.  In all this time she has proved to be timely in her payments and in the activities she undertakes as a group.  She will continue with this mystical manner of continuous improvement in everything she undertakes. With the requested loan, she will buy bags of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy bags of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Florencia Arminda

texts.es: La señora Florencia dedicada a la confección de mandiles, su taller es en su domicilio la señora se sacrifica mucho en la confección  de estos mandiles ya que durante toda la semana debe de costurar para así entregar los sábados de cada semana, ya que le realizan muchos pedidos por la buena calidad del producto terminado,  la cliente esta en su segundo crédito, la señora se animo nuevamente ya que en l primer crédito le fue muy bien y mejoraron sus ingresos, ahora con el segundo crédito la Sra. comprara una maquina de coser, el sueño de la señora es continuar trabajando con la institución y formar su propio taller con  muchas maquinas, y ser una empresaria con éxito.
texts.en:
Señora Florencia makes aprons in a room in her house. Sewing the aprons is very hard work and Florencia has to work throughout the week so that she has enough to sell on Saturdays. She gets many orders because of the good quality of the finished product. 

Florencia is on her second loan cycle. She is keen to take out another loan as the first one went so well and she was able to increase her income. With the second loan she will buy a sewing machine. Her greatest wish is to continue working with the institution and open her own workshop with many sewing machines. In this way she would become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.es:
Cornelia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Medalla Milagrosa”, ubicado en el distrito de Pomata, provincia de Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene cuatro  hijos (dos en estudio y dos  independientes).  Tiene educación primaria.
Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, frutas y abarrotes, sus productos los vende en las ferias de la localidad.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace siete años,  su préstamo anterior que fue de  S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, invirtió en la compra de corderos y los engordó por tres meses.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará tres sacos de chuño blanco, chuño negro, papa, corderos, trucha, nos cuenta que estos productos los compra en las ferias de Chacachaca y así como otros insumos.  En el negocio trabaja sola, a veces sus hijos la ayudan ya que su esposo trabaja (es policía).
Su sueño es tener una tienda de abarrotes para cuidar su salud porque dice que la venta de comida y abarrotes es muy cansado.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, la capacitación de brindan a las socias y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Cornelia is a member of the Medalla Milagrosa Community Bank which is located in Pomata district, Chuchito province, in the department of Puno. She is 56 years old, has a common-law partner, and four children, two of whom are still in school, and the other two are independent. She completed primary school.

Cornelia sells food, fruit, and groceries in the local markets. She has worked with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for seven years. Her previous loan of S/. 300 was used to buy lambs which she fattened up for three months.

With this new loan of S/. 1500 she will buy three bags of white chuño (freeze-dried potato, traditional in Peru), black chuño, potatoes, lambs, and trout. She will buy these items in the Chacachaca markets as well as other supplies. 

Cornelia works alone although sometimes her children and husband (a policeman) give her a hand.

Her dream is to have a grocery store so that she can take better care of herself as selling food and groceries in the markets is very tiring.

She most enjoys the punctuality, the training of members, and the sense of responsibility that the community bank provides.

loans.use: white chuño (freeze-dried potato), black chuño, potatoes, lambs, and trout

loans.name: Pro Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PRO FORTALEZA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Candelaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de salchipapas, panadería, venta de carne chancho, venta de guitarras y zampoñas, comedera, venta de café, venta de artefactos.

La señora Candelaria,  indica que es la primera vez que trabaja con Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de sus amigas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de radios desde hace un año atrás, aprendiendo este negocio de su familia. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra aumentar su capital (compra de radios) que comprará por mayor de la calle Uyustus y que posterior a lo venderá en la Plaza 16 de Julio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación.

En la fotografia se encuentra una amiga de una de las socias.
texts.en:
The A.C. Pro Fortaleza Community Bank will begin its first loan cycle with Kiva partner Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes regional office. There are nine members in the group with a board of directors headed by Sra. Candelaria. The members have a variety of businesses: selling hot dogs and fries, bakery, pork butcher, guitar and panpipes sales, cafe, coffee sales, and crafts.

Señora Candelaria says this is the first time that she has worked with Pro Mujer and she joined the institution after being invited by her friends. She’s had a business selling radios for one year and learned the trade from her family.

The loan she is seeking will be used to buy radios at wholesale prices in Uyustus Street, and she will then sell them in the Plaza 16 de Julio. Her job allows her to earn money to support her family; she is single and has two children.

When she was asked what she most likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she enjoys the training program. 

In the photograph a friend of one of the members can also be seen.

loans.use: to buy radios

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es: El señor Wilson, oriundo de Agua y Castilla  del departamento de  Chuquisaca, estado civil soltero, su actividad es de albañil, esta prestando su servicio en la ciudad de santa cruz en un condominio, el sr. Wilson  esta agradecido con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en el y brindarle un apoyo para poder obtener una línea de moto taxi y así obtener otra fuente de ingreso y una mejor calidad de vida, es un joven trabajador con ganas de superación.
texts.en:
Wilson, a native of Agua y Castilla in the department of Chuquisaca, is single and works as a mason. He is currently working at a condominium in the city of Santa Cruz.

Wilson is grateful to Emprender for having confidence in him and offering him support so that he can obtain a moto-taxi line and thereby have another source of income and a better quality of life. He is a young man with a desire for self-improvement.

loans.use: to buy a moto-taxi line

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 49 años de edad, es conviviente y no tiene hijos.  Estudió la secundaria.
La señora Carmen se dedica a la venta de productos de la Región como quinua, habas, trigo, papa, coca, etc, trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año,  su préstamo  anterior  fue de  S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, invertirá en la compra de diez arrobas de quinua y habas, para luego venderlos en la ciudad de Puno, en el negocio le ayuda su esposo quien se dedica a la venta de ceviche (comida típica).  En sus ratos libres, Carmen se dedica al tejido  de chompas.
Su sueño es seguir creciendo y mejorar el negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the communal bank “Virgen de la Asunción”, located in the district and province of Yunguyo, Puno department.  She is 49, in a common-law marriage, doesn’t have children, and studied through secondary school.

Carmen sells regional products such as quinoa, lima beans, wheat, potatoes, coca leaves, etc.  She has worked with the Manuela Ramos movement for the past year.  Her last loan was for 500 new sols and she used it for her business.

She will use the new loan of 1000 sols to buy 10 arrobas (a weight under a kilo) of quinoa and lima beans so that she can sell them in Puno.  Her husband helps here in the business and he sells ceviche (a typical food of marinated raw fish with herbs and spices). In her free time Carmen knits sweaters.
Her dream is to have her business continue growing and improving.

What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of financing.

loans.use: To buy 10 arrobas (weight under a kilo) of quinoa and lima beans

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: Verónica  tiene 31 años, radica desde hace 8 años en su localidad en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos  en casa de unos familiares. Desde hace 5 años se dedica a sembrar sobre su pequeña extensión que posee, así como en terrenos que arrienda. Paralelo a ello, cría cerdos y ovejas y que al cabo de un tiempo  son vendidos en la feria ganadera de su comunidad. De esta manera logra tener ingresos, además para minimizar los gastos de alimentación, prefiere sembrar alfalfa y pastos,  y del cual logra también venderlos generándose más ingresos. Todas estas actividades le permiten sostener su hogar, es por esta razón que  desea aumentar su capital de trabajo. Tiene mucho tiempo trabajando con MFP,  se animo a trabajar  de manera grupal por los ahorros programados que tiene y que es de mucha ayuda en su economía y es por esta razón que continua solicitando créditos. Con el dinero que solicita, será para sembrar pasto asimismo comprará ovejas y cerdos.
texts.en:
Verónica is 31 years old and has been a resident of her town for eight years. She lives with her husband and two children in the home of some relatives. For the past five years, Verónica has been farming on a small piece of land that she owns as well as on rented land. In addition, she raises pigs and sheep to sell at the livestock fair in her community. To generate income and minimize the cost of feeding her animals, Verónica grows alfalfa and grasses. She also sells these crops to generate a little more revenue. All of the activities enable her to maintain her household. For this reason, she wants to increase her operating capital.

Verónica has worked with MFP for a long time. She is excited about working with a group and the automatic savings plan, which has been a great help for her finances. For this reason, she plans to continue requesting loans. With the money she requested, Verónica will plant grass as well as buy sheep and pigs.

loans.use: to purchase grass seed, sheep, and pigs.

loans.name: Brigida Nancy

texts.es:
Brigida  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Niño Jesús de Praga”, ubicado en el distrito de Yunguyo, provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.  Tiene educación superior incompleta.
Desde hace ocho años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de  S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de venta al por mayor de granos de la Región.  En la actualidad se dedica a la venta de chifleria (peines, hojas de afeitar, tijeras, cortaúñas, pilas, etc).
Con este nuevo préstamo de  S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, aumentará al capital de su negocio y comprará mercaderías como champú en frasco, detergentes de todo tamaño y otras mercaderías, para implementar el negocio.  Ella cuenta con la ayuda su esposo, quien vende telas en la ciudad de Cusco por temporadas.
Su sueño es tener una tienda bien surtida y ser mayorista.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, el compartir con las socias y las bromas.
texts.en:
Brigida is a member of the Communal Bank “Niño Jesús de Praga” which is located in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 35 years old, married, and has three children. Brigida did not finish her higher education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for eight years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN and invested in her business of selling regional grains in bulk. At the moment, she sells personal accessories such as combs, razor blades, scissors, nail clippers, batteries, and other items.

With this new loan of 300 PEN, Brigida will increase her business capital for buying merchandise such as bottles of shampoo, detergents in all sizes, and other merchandise to keep her business in operation. She receives help from her husband, who sells fabric in the city of Cusco on a seasonal basis.

Her dreams are to have a well-stocked store and to become a wholesaler. What she likes about the Communal Bank are the meetings, being able to share with the other members, and the fun atmosphere.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, detergents, and other types of merchandise.

loans.name: Inéz

texts.es: La señora Inéz dedicada la venta carne  de pollo durante toda la semana en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su domicilio  ella en horas muy tempranas debe de recoger los pollos que entregan por mayor a ella y a muchas mas personas que se dedican a este negocio, la Sra. Inéz  con la ayuda de su esposo realiza las ventas diarias logrando terminar los pollos adquiridos ese día, ya por la tarde se van a casa  para estar con sus pequeños y descansar ya que vendrá otro día que los agotara ellos con el tiempo desean abrir una sucursal muy grande para que así puedan tener mas ingresos y así poderles dar una mejor vida a sus pequeños hijos, con el dinero del credito comprara una heladera grande para mantener la carne pollo fresca, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Inéz sells chicken throughout the week at the market near her home. In the early morning hours, she buys chickens that are delivered in bulk since there are many other people who engage in the same type of business. Sra. Inéz has help from her husband with selling all of the chickens she acquired on a given day. In the afternoons, they go home to be with their children and to rest for another day. Within time, they hope to open a larger branch where they can generate more income so that they can provide a better life for their young children.

With the money from this loan, Inéz will buy a large refrigerator for storing fresh chicken. She is a hardworking individual who appreciates the support Emprender has provided.

loans.use: to purchase a large refrigerator.

loans.name: Bertha Amalia

texts.es:
Bertha es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos.  Cuenta con educación primaria.
Desde hace tres años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  su primer préstamo  fue por la suma  de  S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir, también se dedica a la venta de motos, accesorios, verduras, frutas, los vende en las ferias de la localidad.
Bertha solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, con el cual comprará dos motos para luego venderlas en Desaguadero, Ilave y en Yunguyo.  En el negocio trabaja sola y a veces le ayuda una señora.
Su sueño es seguir con  el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunión con las socias y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Bertha is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de La Asunción” which is located in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 39 years old and a single mother with three children. Bertha has an elementary school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for three years. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN and the money was invested in her business of selling clothes. She also sells motorcycles, accessories, vegetables, and fruits at the fairs in her town.

Bertha is requesting a new loan of 3000 PEN so that she can buy two motorcycles to sell later in Desaguadero, Ilave, or Yunguyo. She works alone in business, but occasionally she receives help from another woman.

Her dream is to continue with her business and improve her income. What she likes about the Communal Bank are the meetings with the other members and the convenience of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase two motorcycles for resale.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: El señor Armando nacido en Chuquisaca casado con la Sra. Paulina ella se dedica a labores del hogar, tienen 4 hijos todos pequeños, ellos tienen su parcela en Santo Corazón a 6 km de Limoncito donde viven y trabajan en la agricultura, el siembra maní, yuca, maíz, y sorgo para fabricas de escobas. Todo lo que el produce lo comercializa en el mercado del Torno, el destino del crédito es para la compra de semilla para siembra de maní y yuca, hace unos 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad, donde le va muy bien, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Armando was born in Chuquisaca and is married to Ms. Paulina, who takes care of their household duties. The have four children who are all young. They have a parcel of land in Santo Corazón, 6 kilometers from Limoncito, where they live and work in agriculture. Armando plants peanuts, yucca, corn, and sorghum for making brooms. He sells everything that he produces in the Torno market. This loan will be used to buy seeds for planting peanuts and yucca. He has been doing this work for eight years and it is going very well. He is a very hard-working person and is grateful for the support he is being offered.

loans.use: to buy peanut and yucca seeds

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: El señor Vicente nacido en Chuquisaca casado con la Sra. Martha, ella es ama de casa, tienen dos hijos, hace 10 años que llegaron aquí a Santa Cruz para buscar mejor vida, en la cual lo encontraron adquiriendo una parcela para trabajar en agricultura, su actividad mayormente es la siembra de  hortalizas y verduras como ser: zanahoria, camote, acelga, repollo y todo lo que el hace producir lo comercializa personalmente al consumidor, el destino del créditos es para la siembra de camote y para el preparado de la tierra, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señor Vicente was born in Chuquisaca.  He is married to Señora Martha.  She is a housewife.  They have two children.  Ten years ago they arrived here in Santa Cruz in search of a better life.  They have acquired a plot of agricultural land to work.  His primary activity is sowing vegetables and root crops such as carrots, sweet potatoes, chard, and cabbage.  Everything that he produces he markets personally to the consumer.  The purpose of the loan is for the sowing of sweet potatoes and to prepare the land.  He is a very hard worker and grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: to sow sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Bethy

texts.es:
Bethy tiene 36 años , radica en su pueblo natal  con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Hace 7 años que se dedica a la agricultora, produce papa y granos; paralelamente cría  animales como toros, que lo adquiere muy tiernos antes que lleguen a desarrollar por completo, para así alimentarlo y darles el peso exacto y ser vendido s aun buen precio, de esa manera  genera los ingresos que necesita para su familia. En cuanto a lo que cosecha los vende en el mercado principal de su ciudad, durante los días miércoles y domingo cuando es la feria comercial y cada 2 meses aproximadamente vende sus animales en la feria ganadera de su zona. En todos estos años le ha resultado beneficioso en sus ganancias por lo que se anima a continuar con este esfuerzo en bienestar de la educación de sus hijos menores. Tiene varios años trabajando de manera grupal en el banco comunal que integra   de las cuales esta es la oportunidad 14 que tiene con MFP, Es admirable  la perseverancia de su persona ya que es una de las socias mas antiguas de su grupo y estar aun en los tiempos difíciles que tuvo el banco comunal que integra. Para esta ocasión ella sigue renovando su esfuerzo y su actitud positiva.
Con el dinero, comprará sacos de abono orgánico para sembrar papa.
texts.en:
Bethy is 36 years of age.  She lives in the city of her birth with her husband and their 2 children in their own home.  For 7 years she has been dedicated to agriculture, producing potatoes and grains.  At the same time, she raises animals such as bulls, which she acquires very young when they are not yet completely developed, to fatten and raise to the right weight to sell at a good price.  In this general manner she earns the necessary income for her family.  As to her harvest, she sells that in the commercial market of her city on Wednesdays and Sundays.  Approximately every 2 months she sells her animals in the cattle market of her area. All these years have had a beneficial effect on her income, which encourages her to continue her efforts for the welfare and education of her small children.  She has worked for several years with her group in the communal bank.  This is her 14th loan with MFP.  Her perseverence is admirable, as she is one of the associates who has been working with the communal bank the longest.  On this occasion, she will continue renewing her effort and her positive attitude. 
With the money she will buy sacks of organic fertilizer to sow potatoes.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Ysmael

texts.es: El Sr. Ysmael vive en casa de sus padres en la zona el Dorado, es soltero y hace un año que se dedica a la elaboración de pan con la colaboración de sus padres, actualmente tiene su propio capital donde ya es independiente, el crédito que se le otorgo es para la compra de harina, manteca, azúcar por quintal ya que tiene mucha clientela. El sr. Ysmael coloca sus panes en las ventas por su barrio y otros lugares que con el tiempo se esta haciendo conocer.   El sr. quedo muy agradecido por oportunidad y confianza que se le brindo al otorgarle dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Ysmael lives at the home of his parents in the District of El Dorado. He is single and has been making bread for the past year alongside his parents. Ysmael currently possesses his own capital, so he is independent. The loan being provided to him will be used to buy flour, butter, and sugar by the “quintal” (1 quintal = 46kg) since he has many customers.

Sr. Ysmael offers his baked goods for sale in his neighborhood and in other places where he has gained a reputation over time. He is very grateful for the opportunity and the trust that has been demonstrated to him by providing this loan.

loans.use: to purchase flour, butter, and sugar.

loans.name: Fuerza De Mujer Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal se llama “Fuerza de mujer” está conformado por 19 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran la venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de ropa nueva, venta de ropa interior y perfumes. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de San Javier.
Celinda quien en la foto aparece en cuclillas y más cercana al lado derecho de la foto, usa su cabello corto, además viste un chaleco color burdeo y encima trae puesto un chaleco sin mangas color negro.
Ella realiza dos actividades, la primera de estas es atender y vender sus productos de abarrotes, cecinas, lácteos, artículos de aseo y artículos de bazar en un almacén que se encuentra ubicado en su casa, su horario de atención son todos los días de la semana desde las 9ºº horas de la mañana hasta las 11ºº horas de la noche. Mientras que los fines de semana durante las mañanas se dedica a vender ropa de segunda mano y nueva en una feria persa cercana a su domicilio. Se dedica a estos negocios desde hace 9 años.
Con el crédito surtirá su almacén de mercadería entre ropa, abarrotes, lácteos y cecinas congeladas.
Celinda vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 19 y 17 años de edad, el mayor de ellos estudia en la universidad la carrera de Psicología. 
Sus sueños son generar mayores ganancias para aumentar sus ingresos y poder proporcionarles a sus hijos un mejor bienestar.
Celinda está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito otorgado por Fondo Esperanza, ya que con éste podrá invertir en su negocio y generará mayores ganancias. Comenta que las reuniones del grupo del banco comunal al cual pertenece son muy amenas, ya que las demás socias son unidas, comprometidas y organizadas. Celinda es la presidenta del banco comunal, por ende su motivación y alegría.
San Javier es una comuna y ciudad de la zona central de Chile, perteneciente a la región del Maule. Se caracteriza por ser una zona esencialmente vitivinícola. Los viñedos locales pertenecen a la zona denominada Valle del Loncomilla, de donde provienen algunos de los mejores vinos chilenos, Viña Carolina y Viña Gillmore, entre otras.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called “Fuerza de Mujer” (Strength of Woman) and consists of 19 entrepreneurs who engage in different business activities such as selling secondhand clothing, selling new clothes, and selling undergarments and perfumes. All of them are from the city of San Javier.

In the photograph, Celinda is crouching and positioned closer to the right side. She has short hair and is wearing a burgundy jacket with a black sleeveless vest over it. Celinda has two businesses. The first one involves managing a store in her home where she sells groceries, sausages, dairy products, toiletries, and bazaar items. Her work schedule every weekday is from 9am to 11pm. On the weekends, she sells secondhand clothing in the mornings and new clothes at a Persian fair near her home. She has managed these businesses for nine years. With this loan, Celinda will restock her store with more clothes, groceries, dairy products, and frozen sausages.

Celinda lives with her husband and two children, ages 19 and 17. Her oldest child is studying at the university for a degree in psychology. Her dreams are to generate more earnings to increase her income and to provide for her children’s well-being. Celinda is very pleased with and grateful for the loan provided by Fondo Esperanza because she will able to invest it in her business and earn a better income. She says that the Communal Bank meets are very entertaining. The members are united, committed, and organized. Celinda serves as the Communal Bank President, which provides her both motivation and joy.

The city of San Javier is a community located in the central part of Chile and is part of the Maule region. It is essentially known as a winemaking area. The local vineyards are in an area called “Valle del Loncomilla” where some of the best Chilean wines are produced such as Viña Carolina, Viña Gillmore, and others.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, groceries, dairy products, and frozen sausages.

loans.name: Mary Isabel

texts.es: La  señora Mary  es cliente antigua  de emprender que esta retornando de mucho tiempo ella  vende artículos varios en la ceja de el alto, tiene un puesto fijo. Con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería para surtir su puesto, ya que se acercan las fechas festivas de ciudad y tendrá mucha venta, la Sra.  Mary  vive en  la zona  la portada la cliente esta muy contenta de haberse beneficiado  con el credito kiva. La cliente es muy trabajadora porque a la vez doña Mary teje carteras de lana y chompas, tiene  dos hijos que están estudiando, y el deseo de la Sra. es el de ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en:
Sra. Mary is a long-time client of Emprender who is returning after a long absence. She sells various products from an established location in the neighborhood of La Ceja in the city of El Alto. Using the money from this loan, she will buy merchandise to restock her stand. As the dates of the city festivals draw near, Mary will be able to generate more sales. She lives in the District of La Portada. Doña Mary is pleased to know that she will benefit from a Kiva loan.

She is a hardworking woman since she also knits sweaters and handbags made of wool. Mary has two children who are students, so she wants to see them become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of merchandise in time for the city festivals.

loans.name: Mary Shirley

texts.es: La señora Mary es socia antigua de nuestra institución ya que se encuentra en su segunda secuencia, ella es casada y tiene 2 hijas  pequeñas, vive en casa familiar. La Señora tiene el negocio de repostería y que entrega a pedido tortas para todo acontecimiento (cumpleaños, bautizo, matrimonios, etc) ; su negocio  tiene una antigüedad de mas de 5 años   y el crédito que solicitó es para compra de un horno industrial y para proveerse se otros insumos ya que el negocio esta creciendo y necesita capital para comprar las herramientas e insumos que necesita para la elaboración de sus tortas, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Mary is a long-time member of Emprender who is participating in her second loan cycle. She is married and lives in the family home with her two young daughters. Sra. Mary has a pastry business in which she delivers cakes for all types of events including birthdays, baptisms, weddings, and other occasions. Her business has been in operation for more than five years.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy an industrial oven and other supplies for her growing business. She needs the capital to buy equipment and necessary supplies for making her cakes. Mary is a hardworking individual who is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial oven and baking supplies.

loans.name: Nuñez Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Núñez está conformado por Milagros Del Socorro y Maria. Ambas tienen diferentes actividades económicas pero se llevan muy bien. Maria es una persona muy emprendedora y disfruta de su actividad económica, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan para disfrutar de los deliciosos platillos que ofrece. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de granos básicos, verduras, carnes, pollos, frutas para la elaboración de refrescos entre otros. Sueña con lograr construir una habitación en su vivienda.
texts.en:
The Núñez Solidarity Group consists of Milagros del Socorro and Maria. Even though they engage in different business activities, they get along well with each other. Maria is an enterprising individual who enjoys her business. Most of her customers come to enjoy the delicious dishes that she offers.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy basic grains, vegetables, meats, chicken, fruits for making refreshments, and other supplies. She dreams of building a room in her home.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, vegetables, meats, chicken, fruits, and other supplies.

loans.name: Lizeth Angelica

texts.es: La Sra. Lizeth  tiene como actividad la venta de comida, en especial la venta de pollos broaster, actividad que desarrolla todos los días de la semana, ella es una persona joven muy trabajadora su familia esta compuesta por su esposo quien también trabaja como mensajero de una institución y su pequeños tres hijos,  el destino del crédito es para la compra de una maquina spiedera y la renovación de mobiliario de su snack para poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes ya que es muy conocida por el buen servicio que brinda a sus clientes, es una persona joven con ganas de superación agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Lizeth has a food business that specializes in selling roasted chickens. She manages her business every day of the week. Lizeth is a hardworking young woman. Her family consists of her husband, who works as a messenger for an institution, and their three small children.

This loan will be used to buy a rotisserie spit and to replace the furnishings in her snack bar so that she can provide better service to her customers. She is already well-known for providing good service to her customers. Lizeth is a young person who has the desire to succeed. She is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy a rotisserie spit and to replace the furnishings in her snack bar.

loans.name: Arcos De Miacatlan Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Arcos de Miacatlan"  porque cerca de donde esta el grupo hay unos  arcos que identifican a la poblacion, esta ubicado en el estado de Morelos, en Mexico. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y es la cuarta vez que solicitan un prestamo. Mayra es integrante del grupo, tiene 33 años, estudio una carrera comercial en secretariado, es comerciante, tiene un total 2 hijas; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa negocio que inicio hace 5 años, solicita el prestamo para comprar calcetas, calcetines, y algunos uniformes para el ingreso de los niños a las escuelas. Sus clientes la prefieren porque les lleva los articulos hasta sus hogares, al momento de solicitar el prestamo se siente contenta porque tendra mercancia para la temporada de regreso a clases. Tambien espera con las ganancias comprar los utiles escolares de sus hijos ya que son caros y quiere que vayan muy preparados a el nuevo ciclo escolar, comenta que para ella es muy importante la educación de sus hijos ya que les abre la oportunidad de tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
This group is called “Arcos de Miacatlan” (Arches of Miacatlan). The name reflects a set of arches that are located near where the group meets and help to identify this town which is located in the State of Morelos in Mexico. There are nine members in this group and this is the fourth time they have requested a loan.

Mayra is a member of the group. She is 33 years old and studied to pursue a business career as a secretary. Mayra works as a merchant and has two daughters. She sells clothing at her business which she started five years ago. Mayra is requesting a loan to buy stockings, socks, and a few school uniforms for children. Her customers prefer to do business with her because she delivers her merchandise to their homes. Upon requesting her loan, Mayra was pleased because she would be able to obtain merchandise before the school season started again. She also hopes to earn enough money to buy school supplies for her children since they can be expensive. Mayra wants her children to be prepared for the new school year. She says that it is very important that her children have an education because it will open opportunities for them to have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase stockings, socks, and a few school uniforms.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: El 24 de junio de cada año se celebra en bolivia la festividad de san juan donde se tiene por tradición hacer fogatas y comer salchichas (hot dog). La Sra. Martha, en estas fiestas tiene varios clientes ya que ella tiene un frial - carnicería y siempre tiene los mejores productos en embutidos para celebrar san juan. Ella vive en la zona de alto pampahasi que esta ubicada a 25 minutos del centro de la ciudad. Ella trabaja con su frial desde hace 3 años y actualmente tiene buen capital y mercadería. Pero ya que en estas fechas incrementa su venta de salchichas tiene que incrementar sus pedidos por esta razón solicita el crédito para la compra de salchichas y embutidos. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y amable y en el tiempo que trabaja con créditos de emprender siempre a demostrado ser puntual y responsable.
texts.en:
On June 24th of each year, Bolivia celebrates the Festival of San Juan. Part of the tradition involves building bonfires and eating sausages (hot dogs). Sra. Martha has many customers around this holiday since she operates a meat locker and butcher shop. She always has the best cured meats for celebrating the Festival of San Juan.

Martha lives in the District of Alto Pampahasi, which is located 25 minutes from the central part of the city. Her meat locker has been in operation for three years and she currently has sufficient capital and merchandise. As the date of the festival approaches, her sales increase since she is receiving more orders. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy sausages and cured meats.

Martha is a very responsible and friendly individual. Throughout the time she has worked with the loans from Emprender, she has always demonstrated that she is punctual and responsible.

loans.use: to purchase sausages and cured meats.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Alberto, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casado y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado por lo cual lo que hará es suministrarle lo necesario para una buena cosecha esta próxima temporada. El quiere obtener de su cafetal mayores resultados y así generar las ganancias para salir adelante con el proyecto y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 32 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children who are his highest priorities. He intends to use this loan to buy the necessary supplies for maintaining his coffee crop. His land has already been planted, but he needs to obtain the essentials for achieving a good harvest for next season. Luis wants to achieve better results with his coffee crop so that he can generate income to move forward with his farming project and provide his family a better quality of life.

This is the second loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Luis has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for maintaining his coffee crop.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William, tiene la edad de 41 años, está casado y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con un terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo y ya sembrado por lo cual lo que el quiere realizar es la compra de los abonos y lo necesario para una mejor cantidad de producción esta próxima cosecha. el quiere generar ganancias para las necesidades de su familia y seguir creciendo como un caficultor de la zona. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William is 41 years old, married, and lives with his wife and child who are his highest priorities. He intends to use this loan to buy the necessary supplies for maintaining his coffee crop. William has a suitable plot of land for growing this type of crop. Since the planting is finished, he wants to buy compost because it is necessary for producing a large quantity for the next harvest. William wants to generate income so that he can provide for the needs of his family and continue growing as a local coffee producer.

This is the second loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. William has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies for maintaining his coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy metal.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es: María Concepción D. cuarenta y cinco años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus  tres hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tienda la cual quiere surtir con más productos para hacerse D. más clientes y obtener más ganancias, ella quiere estar adelante D. su competencia. María Concepción piensa que el inicio D. su riqueza y felicidad estará al final D. su duro trabajo y dedicación quiere ver crecer su negocio y por eso se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar productos como golosinas, pan, productos instantáneos, lácteos, embutidos, bebidas entre otros; así estará un paso más cerca D. cumplir su meta. María Concepción tiene la esperanza que con esto lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida y les llevara seguridad  económica a su hogar.
texts.en: María Concepción is forty-five years old.  She owns her own home and lives with her life companion and three children.  She owns a small store that she wants to stock with more products in order to obtain more customers and earn more income.  She wants to be ahead of her competition.   María Concepción thinks that the beginning of her wealth and happiness will be at the end of her hard work and dedication.  She wants to see her business grow so she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL.  The loan will allow her to buy products such as sweets, bread, instant products, dairy products, cold cured meat, beverages, and other products.  In this way, she will be a step closer to completing her goal.  María Concepción hopes that this loan will enable her to give her family a better quality of life and bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy sweets, bread, instant products, dairy products, cold cured meat, and beverages.

loans.name: Aracely Esmeralda

texts.es: Aracely Esmeralda D. treinta y ocho años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos. Ella posee un comedor el cual es muy visitado por las personas D. la localidad porque Aracely prepara los platillos más exquisitos, con un sabor inigualable; desayunos y almuerzos en variedad para el gusto del cliente y con un precio realmente accesible. Para ella la confianza en sí misma es la clave D. la motivación en el desarrollo personal y D. su trabajo quiere ver crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materiales como granos básicos, carnes, verduras, embutidos, lácteos, bebidas entre otros para seguir preparando sus deliciosas comidas y satisfacer las necesidades D. su clientela. Aracely Esmeralda tiene fe que su esfuerzo le dará la oportunidad D. llevar seguridad económica a su hogar.
texts.en: Aracely Esmeralda is thirty-eight years old.  She lives with her life partner and her children.  She owns a canteen that is frequently visited by the townspeople. Aracely prepares the most exquisite dishes with incomparable flavor.  She pleases her customers by preparing a variety of breakfasts and lunches at a reasonable price.  For her, self-confidence is the motivational key to personal development.  She wants to see her business grow so she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  The loan will enable her to buy materials such as basic grains, meats, vegetables, cold cured meat, dairy products, beverages and other products to continue preparing her delicious meals and satisfy the needs of her customers.  Aracely Esmeralda has faith that her hard work will give her the opportunity to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, meat, vegetables, cold cured meat, dairy products, and beverages.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: Luis Miguel de veintitrés años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo. El posee una tienda que es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad; se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene lo que necesitan, productos de muy buena calidad y a un buen precio. Luis Miguel piensa que las personas creamos nuestro propio éxito con el esfuerzo del trabajo que realizamos, y él siempre está dispuesto a salir adelante es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita surtir la tienda con productos como granos básicos, golosinas, pan, productos instantáneos, bebidas, jabón etc.; así podrá mantenerse adelante de la competencia. Luis Miguel tiene la confianza que esto le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Luis Miguel is 23 years old, and he lives with his life partner and their child. He owns a store well renowned among the people of his community: he has gained many customers because he always has what they need, his sells good quality products and charges fair prices. Luis Miguel thinks people create their own fortune by doing their jobs with determination; and as he is always keen on improving himself, he is requesting a loan to INTERGRAL in order to supply his store with products such as basic grains, candies, bread, instant products, drinks and soap, thus succeeding in remaining one step ahead of his competitors. Luis Miguel is confident that this will help him provide is family with a fulfilled life.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, candies, bread, instant products, drinks and soap.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es: José Alfredo de veintiséis años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia. El produce tejas que le vende de muy buena calidad se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las vende a precios accesibles; se levanta de desde muy temprano para producir lo propuesto en el día. José Alfredo es una persona muy carismática siempre recibe a su clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro el está convencido de que puede vencer todos los obstáculos que se le presenten es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima para la producción de teja. José Alfredo tiene la esperanza que su esfuerzo en el trabajo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una seguridad económica para el hogar.
texts.en:
José Alfredo, 26, lives with his common-law wife and son in his own home.  He makes high quality roof tiles and has many customers because of his competitive prices.  He gets up early in the morning to produce what he has scheduled for the day.  

José Alfredo is a very charismatic person who receives his customers with a smile.  He is convinced he can overcome all of the obstacles that stand in his way, and therefore is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL so he can buy raw material for his tile production.  He has the hope that through his hard work he will be able to give his family a better lifestyle and financial stability.

loans.use: To buy clay.

loans.name: Grecia Iveth

texts.es: Grecia Iveth, de veinticinco años de edad, vive con sus hijos los cuales asisten a una escuela cerca de la localidad donde residen. Ella posee un puesto de frutas y verduras en un mercado muy conocido en el lugar; tiene mucha clientela pues vende la fruta y verdura más fresca y de buena calidad y a un buen precio, gracias a ello esta adelante de su competencia. Grecia piensa que la felicidad esta en las personas que deciden serlo es por eso que ella está dispuesta a seguir adelante es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, manzanas etc. Así podrá mantener su clientela y generar mas. Grecia tiene la confianza que con esto le podrá regalar una vida mas plena a su familia.
texts.en:
Grecia Iveth, 25, lives with her children who attend school in the town where they live.  She has a fruit and vegetable stand at a well-known market, and has many customers because she offers fresh, quality products at reasonable prices.  Because of this she is ahead of her competitors.

Grecia believes that happiness resides in people who decide they want to be happy.  That's why she wants to get ahead and decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL so she can buy tomatoes, onions, chili peppers, bananas, apples, etc.  This will enable her to keep her current customers and generate more income.  She is confident that this will help her provide a more fulfilling lifestyle for her family.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, onions, chili peppers, bananas and apples.

loans.name: Nhen

texts.en: Nhen, 59 year old, is a grocery seller. Her income is $3 per day. She is a single mother with two children. Both of the children are working with $2 per day income for each of them.  Every month she has to spend $50 on food, $15 on transportation, and $20 on other expenses. She would like to request a loan of $1,000 to buy a motorbike with a cart attached for her son to transport coconuts to sell to make more income. Before, she sold cake but this career couldn't make a good income in all seasons so she needed to change to another career that could make an income in all seasons. She wants to sell more grocery goods and buy more coconuts for son to sell because this career can make a good profit.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike with a cart attached for her son's career

loans.name: Catalina Santos

texts.es: Catalina Santos vive con su compañero de vida; ella posee un taller de confección que es muy conocido en la localidad pues tiene mucha experiencia en el ámbito elabora prendas al gusto del cliente, se encuentra a la vanguardia y esta adelante de su competencia; además tiene precios accesibles  y calidad de trabajo excelente. Catalina piensa que cuando tiene su vida enfocada en un propósito y da lo mejor de si, este se vuelve prospero, es por eso que le solicita  a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar telas para la confección de nuevas prendas. Catalina tiene fe que con su trabajo podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Catalina Santos lives with her common-law husband.  She has a sewing workshop that is well known in her town because of her vast experience making garments that are pleasing to her customers.  She is in the vanguard and ahead of her competitors, offering reasonable prices and excellent work quality.

Catalina believes that when she focuses on something in life and gives it her all, it becomes prosperous.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy fabric to make new clothes.  She has faith that through her work she will be able to provide financial stability and a better lifestyle for her family.

loans.use: To buy fabric.

loans.name: Bropo

texts.en: Brorpo, 43 year old, is a farmer with her husband. Their income is $2 per day. She has five children. Four of the children are studying and one is working in a factory with  an income of $5 per day. Every month she has to spend $50 on food, $5 on electricity, $25 on school fee, $20 on transportation, $10 on rent and $15 on other expenses. She would like to request a loan of $700 to buy cows to feeding and breed to produce calves to sell so that she can gain more income for her family. She plans to have a farm to feed chickens and pigs if she is able to save enough money to start. She expects to send all of her children to study at the university when they finish high school.

loans.use: To buy cows to breed

loans.name: Botha

texts.en:
Botha, 44, is a rice farmer. Her husband, Sambat, 45 is a rice farmer and drives a motor taxi when he is free from his farming business. They have been married since 1987 and have four children: two sons and two daughters. Two are married, one lives in a separate home and another still lives in the family home. One is in school and another one is still young. The family lives in a village along National Road Nnumber Two, about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Botha is asking for a loan of $600 to help purchase a motorbike for her daughter-in-law to drive to work.

Photo: Botha is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To help purchase a motorbike for her daughter-in-law

loans.name: Alba Roxana

texts.es: Alba Roxana de treinta y nueve años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tortillería y pupuseria la cual es muy famosa en el lugar, pues prepara las pupusas más ricas de la localidad y sus tortillas las vende calientitas al gusto del cliente además que tiene los precios más accesibles. Alba Roxana es una mujer emprendedora y muy positiva para ella el punto de partida para una vida mejor es el trabajo constante, es por eso que le solicita INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar material como queso, chicharrón, frijoles, maíz. Así podrá mantener  a flote su negocio. Alba Roxana tiene la confianza que con su trabajo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida con el apoyo que este crédito le dará
texts.en:
Alba Roxana, 39, lives with her common-law husband and two children in their own house.  She has a stand where she makes tortillas and pupusas (stuffed tortillas), and she is famous in her town for making the tastiest pupusas around.  Her tortillas are served warm, made to order for the customers, and her prices are reasonable.

Alba Roxana is an enterprising, positive woman.  In her mind the starting point toward a better life is constant work.  Therefore she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy ingredients such as cheese, pork rind, beans and corn.  This will help keep her business running.  Alba Roxana is confident that through her work she will be able to give her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy cheese, pork rinds, beans and corn.

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov is 45 years old. She sells groceries. Her husband is a chief construction worker and the couple has five children. Three of their children are studying and the other two work in construction with their father. The family income is 7 USD per day. Each month, Pov spends 50 USD on food, 10 USD on electricity, 10 USD on rent, 10 USD on school fees, 20 US on transportation, and 20 USD on other expenses. 

Pov is requesting a loan of 1,200 USD to buy more goods to sell. She is strongly committed to sending all of her children to study in the university and she will work hard to get more income to support them.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to sell

loans.name: Savart

texts.en: Savart is a garment factory worker. Her husband is a scavenger. Their income is $4 per day. She has two children, 7 and 2 years old. One is studying. Every month she has to spend $40 on food, $20 on transportation, $10 on school fee, and $20 on other expenses. She would like to request a loan of $500 to support her husband's business by buying recycle stuff to resell. Before, they were both farmers but they wanted to do something else. Her husband finds being a scavenger is easy and can make a good income if he can buy a lot recycled stuff to stock and resell. In the future, she plans to extend her husband's business if it is running smoothly and making good income.

loans.use: To buy recycled stuff to resell

loans.name: Yann

texts.en:
Yann (in the photo) sells grocery items at home and her husband is in the farming business. Her husband, Tem, grows different kinds of vegetables such as yam and sesame. 
 
Yann is asking for another loan in the amount of $1,000 to help with her husband’s farming business by buying seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and pipes.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and pipes.

loans.name: Vuthy

texts.en: Vuthy, 29 years old, is a garment factory worker. Her husband is a construction worker. Their income is $4 per day. She has one child who is three years old. Every month she has to spend around $70 on every expense for the family. She would like to request a loan of $300 to buy another motorbike to travel to work because her current motorbike is too old and needs a lot of fixing. In the future, she wants to feed chickens at home so that she can have time to take care of her children.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for traveling to work

loans.name: Sa Em

texts.en:
Sa em (in the photo) and her husband, Khoeun, live in a village along National Road Number four, about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have three sons and one daughter-two are in school and other two are still young. 

Sa em is a garment worker, while her husband is a construction worker. She is asking for another loan of $1,200 to fill-up the land around her house. Because the house where she lives is low than her neighboring houses, so when raining season come the water flooded which is difficult for family members to stay.

loans.use: To fill up the land around her house with more soil

loans.name: Irshaad's Group

texts.en:
Irshaad is married with seven children: five sons and two daughters. Due to financial constraints, her elder children had to leave their education and start work to contribute financially to the family. Her eldest son has a business selling used clothes and hosiery. Her second son works at a cycle stand and the third son is a rickshaw driver. Her two daughters are studying in class 8th and do sewing. 

Irshaad is a housewife who stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She is very active and performs her household duties very well. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her eldest son who wants to invest it in his used clothes business. With the loan, he will purchase used clothes and hosiery items in larger quantity to be able to offer more variety to his clients and increase his income. He has been operating his business for the past three years and he thinks that continuous investment can put his business in a very profitable position. Irshaad is hopeful that an investment will bring more profits to him and expand his business.

loans.use: To buy used clothes to sell

loans.name: Lang

texts.en:
Lang and her husband, pictured here, live along National Road Number Five approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have four sons and one daughter. Lang sells lotus and fish that her husband catches and supplements her earnings with a new pig-raising business. Her husband is a fisherman. One of the couple’s children is a garment worker, one is a construction worker, another child assists his father in the fishing business, and the other two are in school.

Lang is requesting a 1,200 USD loan to purchase a motorcycle so that her son, who is a construction worker, can commute to work. This will be her second loan.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike so that her son can commute to work

loans.name: Ana Estela

texts.es: Ana Estela de 55 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en casa familiar con sus dos hijas que ya son mayores de edad. Durante mucho tiempo Ana ha trabajado duramente para sacar adelante a su  querida familia y con grandes dificultades ha logrado que uno de sus hijos asista a la universidad. Ella quiere ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y con mejores oportunidades a las que ella ha tenido.  Ana posee una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia en la cual vende principalmente bebidas y golosinas. La zona es muy tranquila y de fácil acceso para muchas personas que habitan alrededor de su casa. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el objetivo de invertir en su negocio en la compra de diferentes tipos de  bebidas que es lo que más vende en su pequeña tienda. Con esto espera incrementar su nivel de ventas y por ende su nivel de ingresos que le permitan aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Estela, 55, is a single mother and lives in a relative's house with her two daughters who are adults.  Ana has had to work very hard for a long time to help her dear family get ahead.  With great difficulty she was able to put one of her children through college.  She wants her children to have professional careers so they can have better opportunities than what she has had.

Ana has a small store set up where she lives and mainly sells beverages and sweets.  The area is quiet and has easy access for many people who live nearby.  She has decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL in order to buy different types of beverages, which is what she sells most in her small business.  This way she hopes to increase sales and income in order to lead a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy different types of beverages.

loans.name: 03.2.85.quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiền works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Hiền is 22 years old and she is married with one child. Hiền is the group leader of the 03.2.85.Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

Hiền supports one dependent with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hiền's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Hiền has been involved in this business for two years. The main hardship that Hiền faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiền hopes to travel for vacation within the country, for her business to do well, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es: Ana Maribel D. 54 años D. edad habita en su casa con sus tres hijos que ya son mayores D. edad y su esposo José santos L.. Ana posee una pequeña tienda cerca D. su hogar D. residencia. La zona es D. fácil acceso y es muy concurrida por los habitantes del lugar. Ana es una mujer emprendedora y ella desea ver su negocio florecer con el objetivo D. mejorar su condición D. vida y la D. su familia. Este negocio ha sido la principal fuente D. ingreso para Ana desD. hace 10 años y gracias a la ayuda que le brinda su esposo han logrado mantenerlo activo todo este tiempo. Ana desea abastecer su negocio con variedad D. productos D. tienda para atraer a más clientes y D. esta forma lograr su objetivo. Esto la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en variedad D. artículos como: granos básicos (azúcar, arroz, frijoles y maíz), aceite, detergente, productos D. belleza, papel, etc. que son los productos más atractivos para los clientes y los más demandados. No pierD. la fe que D. esta manera logrará aspirar a una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Ana Maribel is 54 years old. She lives in her house with her three children who are grown, and her husband José Santos L.. Ana has a small store close to her house. The area has easy access and is frequented by its residents. Ana is an enterprising woman and she wants to see her business flourish in order to improve her lifestyle and that of her family. This business has been the main source of income for Ana for 10 years. Thanks to her husband's help, they have been able to keep it going all of this time. Ana wants to supply her business with a variety of store products in order to attract more customers and meet her goal. This has motivated her to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in a variety of products such as: basic grains (sugar, rice, beans and corn), oil, detergent, beauty products, paper, etc. These are the products that are the most attractive for the customers and have the highest demand. She hasn't lost faith that in this way she will be able to have a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains (sugar, rice, beans and corn), oil, detergent, beauty products, paper, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of new styles of sandals for different ages, genders and tastes.

loans.name: 56.quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Huệ is 41 years old and is married with two children. She is the group leader of the “56.Quảng Hưng Solidarity Group” which consists of 7 members. Huệ lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. She runs a food stall where she sells snacks. 

Huệ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women in 2010 to improve her business. She has successfully repaid five previous loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Huệ has been involved in her food stall business for one year and her main business hardship is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients to process into food to sell. 

With the profit from her business, Huệ hopes to build a new house. She hopes that her business will do well and that her children will find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make food to sell

loans.name: 84 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuỷ operates a food stall selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell.

Thuỷ is 41 years old and married with two children. Thuỷ is the group leader of the 84 Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of three members. Thuỷ lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thuỷ's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Thuỷ has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Thuỷ faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Thuỷ hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables to sell

loans.name: Magelyn

texts.en: Magelyn is 43 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide the needs of her family. She is an Avon cosmetics products distributor in the Philippines and because of insufficient capital, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000. She wants to buy additional stock of Avon products to sell like lipstick, pressed powder, lotion and perfumes. She has been in this business for five years and she is earning an income of PHP 4,000 monthly. According to Magelyn, she will do everything just to provide the needs of her family, especially to do her responsibility as a mother of her two kids in terms of education and daily needs. In the future, Magelyn would like to save more funds for their future needs and to alleviate her family from poverty.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, pressed powder, lotion and perfumes to sell

loans.name: 11 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vân Anh operates a food stall selling pork pies. She is requesting a loan to purchase pork to make pork pies to sell.

Vân Anh is 26 years old and she is married with no children. Vân Anh is the group leader of the 11 Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of eight members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Vân Anh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Vân Anh has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Vân Anh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Vân Anh hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase pork to make pork pies to sell

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús de 42 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su compañero de vida, dos hijos y una hija.  Denys, Lourdes y Fátima de 19,15 y 14 años de edad respectivamente, los cuales se encuentran estudiando y uno de ellos ya logró empezar la Universidad. Su sueño es verlos convertidos en grandes profesionales y con mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido. Para Teresa sus hijos lo son todo y trabaja duramente para sacarlos adelantes. Ella  se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña tiendita que ha logrado establecer en su hogar de residencia. Es una mujer confiable y con mucha amabilidad que ha logrado ganarse la confianza de todo su vecindario, los cuales la prefieren,  ya que  siempre cuenta con lo que ellos necesitan y sobre todo reciben un buen trato. Últimamente ha pensado mucho en cómo hacer crecer su negocio y ha decidido abastecer su tienda con variedad de productos que sean atractivos para los clientes. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los  principales insumos como: bebidas, arroz, frijoles, aceite, golosinas, papel, pan dulce, café,  etc. Que le permitan atraer a más clientes y lograr cumplir su sueño de dar a sus hijos mejores oportunidades.
texts.en: Teresa de Jesus is 42 years old and she lives in her own home together with her life partner, and their two sons and a daughter. They are Denys, Lourdes, and Fatima, aged 19, 15, and 14 years old respectively. They are in school and one of them has started going to university. Her dream is to see them become successful professionals and to enjoy better living conditions to what she has had. For Teresa her children are everything and she works very hard to support them. She sells every day consumer goods from a small store that she has managed to establish in her own home. She is a trustworthy woman and she is very kind. This has helped her to earn the trust of her entire neighborhood. They prefer to buy from her because she always has whatever they need and above all they receive good customer service. Lately she has been going a lot of thinking on how to make her business grow. She has decided to stock her store with a variety of products that would be attractive to clients. Fro this reason she requests a loan from Integral (Kiva Field Partner). She will purchase the goods which are in highest demand: drinks, rice, beans, cooking oil, snacks, bathroom tissue, pastries, coffee, etc. This will help her to attract more clients and it will help her achieve her dream of providing her children with better opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase basic consumer goods, such as drinks, rice, beans, cooking oil, snacks, paper products, pastries, coffee, etc.

loans.name: 53 Điện Biên Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lan has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase processed seafood to resell.

Lan is 55 years old and she is married with two children. Lan is the group leader of the 53 Điện Biên  solidarity group, which consists of six members. Lan lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Lan has been involved in this business for three years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lan hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase processed seafood to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables, such as: yuccas, lemons, beans, potatoes, tomatoes, pinapples, watermelons, melons, oranges, etc.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es: Ana Cristina de 35 años de edad, habita en su casa con su hijo Gerson de 11 años y su hija Lizbeth de 7 años de edad, los cuales ambos se encuentran estudiando. Ana es una mujer emprendedora y sobre todo trabajadora. Posee una lechería y este negocio es el que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia durante mucho tiempo. Se dedica a la venta de leche y queso. Sus productos son muy demandados ya que son de buena calidad, higiene y buen precio. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL,  para invertir en la compra de una descremadora que le felicite el proceso y le ayude a generar más ingresos  que le permitan cumplir su sueño de dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Cristina is 35 years old and she lives in a house of her own together with her son, Gerson, who is 11 years old and her daughter, Lizbeth, who is 7 years old. They are both in school Ana is an enterprising woman and, especially hard working. She had a dairy business and it has helped her to provide for her family for a very long time. She sells milks and cheese. Her products are in high demand for their good quality, hygiene, and good price. She has taken the decision to request a loan from Integral (Kiva Field Partner).
