El cuenta con el terreno ya preparado para su siembra y apto para la explotación de este cultivo en buenas condiciones. El quiere establecer una buena plantación de café para así obtenerle buenas cosechas en su futuro. El piensa en el futuro de su familia y quiere mejorar su nivel de vida cada día más.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José, 47, is married living with his son and wife who are his greatest priorities.  He intends to use the loan to buy farming supplies and seedlings for subsequent transplantation.  He has a field in good condition that’s prepared for planting and apt for this type of farming.  He wants to establish a good coffee plantation to get good harvests in the future.  He is concerned about his family’s future and wants to improve their standard of living more each day.

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has had no previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and farming supplies.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr:
Adjovi est une femme âgé(e) de 40 ans. Elle est mariée å un agent de sécurité. Elle a 02 enfants 
Adjovi travaille comme revendeuse de tomates, de piment et autres depuis 2000. Elle  vend à toute personne au marché d’Akodessewa Elle achète les produits à Lomé. 
Adjovi a requis son  premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des tomates.
texts.en: Adjovi is a 40 year old woman.  She is married to a security guard.  She has two children.  Adjovi has worked as a re-seller of tomatoes, peppers and other products since 2000.  She sells to everyone at the Akodessewa market.  She buys her products in Lomé.  Adjovi has requested her first loan cycle from WAGES in order to purchase tomatoes.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, peppers, and other products

loans.name: Jacinto Andres

texts.es:
Jacinto Andres tiene 44 años, es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos de 13 y 8 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.

Jacinto se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.  Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir trabajando y educar a los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo a las pisinas.
texts.en:
Jacinto Andrés, 44, is married living with his wife and children who are 13 and 8 years of age in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the “El Progreso” (Progress) communal bank are located fifteen minutes from the Chillanes office.  The communal bank has 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank are cocoa bean, corn, banana, soya and manioc farmers.

Jacinto farms cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc.  He makes his purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and his sales take place at the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help him buy farming supplies, fertilizer and manure for his crops.    The loan has helped him in that he’s increased crop yields.  The challenges he has faced have been illness of his laborers and infestations and illnesses of his crops.  His dreams are to be in good health to continue 
working and educating his children.

He enjoys going to swimming pools in his time off.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Dagbegnikin 2 Group

texts.fr: DAGBEGNIKIN 2 est un groupement constitué de dix neuf personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Bernadette. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Bernadette est âgée de 41 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Marcellin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les charges de la famille sont supportées à la fois par le mari et par Bernadette. Il y a environs six ans, Bernadette mène comme activité la vente de fruits et des céréales à son domicile mais aussi par le système de distribution. Bernadette achète ses produits au Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Bernadette et à son groupement DAGBEGNIKIN 2, de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en: The Dagbegnikin 2 group comprises 19 people and its president (with the raised hand in the photo) is named Bernadette. The group members live in the same area in Benin. With the goal of increasing their working capital, this group is seeking its first loan through ALIDÉ. Bernadette is 41 years old and married to a carpenter named Marcellin. The couple have three children, all of whom are in their care and attend school. Bernadette and her husband provide for the family together. For about six years, Bernadette has run a business selling fruit and cereals at her house and also through the local distribution system. She gets her products in Benin. This first loan will certainly allow Bernadette and her group Dagbegnikin 2 to raise the level of their business and increase their clientele and income.

loans.use: To buy fruit and bags of maize.

loans.name: Wilber Javier

texts.es: Wilber es un joven de 28 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 16 años. El cuenta con un puesto de prendas de vestir en una de las avenidas más concurridas de su localidad. Tiene clientes establecidos que están muy contentos con la calidad de su servicio y productos. Wilber solicita este crédito para la compra de pantalones, camisetas, ropa interior, camisolas, trajes para niños entre otros.  El es un cliente muy responsable pues el crédito que nuestra entidad le concedió anteriormente, lo canceló sin problemas. Esta inversión permitirá el desarrollo económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber is a 28-year-old young man who has made a living selling clothes for 16 years. He has a garment stall on one of the most trafficked avenues in his town. He has established customers that are very happy with the quality of his service and his products. 

Wilber is requesting a loan to purchase pants, shirts, underwear, camisoles and children’s clothing among other things. He is a very responsible client. He repaid the previous loan that our organization gave him without any problems. This investment will allow for the economic development of his family.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, underwear, camisoles and children’s clothing among other things.

loans.name: Kossi Gérard

texts.fr:
Kossi Gérard est un homme âgé(e) de 36ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 02 enfants. 
Kossi Gérard travaille comme revendeur de boissons et d’alimentations générales depuis 2009. Il vend à toutes personnes à la devanture de sa maison. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Kossi Gérard a requis son premier cycle de prêt à  WAGES afin d’acheter des boissons, et des produits d’alimentation générale.
texts.en: Kossi Gérard is a 36-year-old man. He is married to a merchant and is the father of two children. He has been selling drinks and groceries since 2009. He sells to passers-by out of his home. He buys his merchandise in Lomé. Kossi Gérard came to the microfinance institution WAGES and applied for his first loan to buy drinks and groceries.

loans.use: to buy drinks and groceries.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel Antonio tiene 31 años, es casado vive con la esposa y la hija de 5 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir con la hija a jugar en el parque.
texts.en:
Manuel Antonio is 31 years old, he is married and lives with his wife and his 5-year-old daughter. He lives in the precinct of El Progreso in the Chillanes canton.

The member communal bank El Progresso is located 15 minutes from the office in Chillanes. It is made up of 13 members and this is the third loan they are requesting from the cooperative. The members of this communal bank make their living in agriculture planting cacao, corn, plantains, soy beans and cassava. 

Manuel makes his living in agriculture planting cacao, corn, plantains, soy beans and cassava. He does his purchasing in Chillanes and San Pablo and makes his sales at the Sunday market in Chillanes.

This loan will help in the purchase of supplies, fertilizers and manure. The loan has helped him to increase his crop production. He has faced challenges such as the workers getting sick as well as pests and disease in the crops. 

His dream is to have his own house. In his free time he likes to go to play in the park with his daughter.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es:
Fatima es comerciante en la venta de ropa, frutas y verduras, el cual desde hace once años vende, 
Su esposo tiene un pequeño taller de pintura automotriz, en donde siempre ha apoyado para el bien comun de la familia. cuando inicio su negocio lo hizo con el fin de poder ayudar  a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Lograndolo atravez de financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado, en donde el sesenta por ciento ha sido para infraestructura, logrando una mejor vivienda para sus hijos.
Con este nuevo prestamo comprara materiales de construccion para hacer pared del fondo de concreto para ir logrando toda la estructura de concreto. para comenzar la obra comprara: bloques, hierro, arena, cemento. El cual esta contenta por el bienestar y seguridad de su familia.
texts.en:
Fátima is a clothes, fruit and vegetable merchant; she’s been in business eleven years.  Her husband has a small car painting shop.  He has always helped support her for the family’s common good.  When she started the business she did so with the goal of helping her husband with household expenses.  She has attained this through Afodenic loans 60% of which have been for infrastructure attaining a better dwelling for her children.

She will use this new loan to buy building materials and supplies to erect a concrete wall at the rear thus attaining a totally concrete structure.  To start the project she will buy: concrete blocks, iron rods, sand and cement.  She is happy because of her family’s security and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to erect a concrete wall at the rear of her house.
